00096 void ED_sculpt_force_update(bContext *C)
00097 {
00098     Object *ob = CTX_data_active_object(C);
00099 
00100     if (ob && (ob->mode & OB_MODE_SCULPT))
00101         multires_force_update(ob);
00102 }

00104 /* Sculpt mode handles multires differently from regular meshes, but only if
00105  * it's the last modifier on the stack and it is not on the first level */
00106 struct MultiresModifierData *sculpt_multires_active(Scene *scene, Object *ob)
00107 {
00108     Mesh *me = (Mesh *)ob->data;
00109     ModifierData *md;
00110 
00111     if (!CustomData_get_layer(&me->ldata, CD_MDISPS)) {
00112         /* multires can't work without displacement layer */
00113         return NULL;
00114     }
00115 
00116     for (md = modifiers_getVirtualModifierList(ob); md; md = md->next) {
00117         if (md->type == eModifierType_Multires) {
00118             MultiresModifierData *mmd = (MultiresModifierData *)md;
00119 
00120             if (!modifier_isEnabled(scene, md, eModifierMode_Realtime))
00121                 continue;
00122 
00123             if (mmd->sculptlvl > 0) return mmd;
00124             else return NULL;
00125         }
00126     }
00127 
00128     return NULL;
00129 }
00130 
00131 /* Check if there are any active modifiers in stack (used for flushing updates at enter/exit sculpt mode) */
00132 static int sculpt_has_active_modifiers(Scene *scene, Object *ob)
00133 {
00134     ModifierData *md;
00135 
00136     md = modifiers_getVirtualModifierList(ob);
00137 
00138     /* exception for shape keys because we can edit those */
00139     for (; md; md = md->next) {
00140         if (modifier_isEnabled(scene, md, eModifierMode_Realtime))
00141             return 1;
00142     }
00143 
00144     return 0;
00145 }
00146 
00147 /* Checks if there are any supported deformation modifiers active */
00148 static int sculpt_modifiers_active(Scene *scene, Sculpt *sd, Object *ob)
00149 {
00150     ModifierData *md;
00151     Mesh *me = (Mesh *)ob->data;
00152     MultiresModifierData *mmd = sculpt_multires_active(scene, ob);
00153 
00154     if (mmd) return 0;
00155 
00156     /* non-locked shape keys could be handled in the same way as deformed mesh */
00157     if ((ob->shapeflag & OB_SHAPE_LOCK) == 0 && me->key && ob->shapenr)
00158         return 1;
00159 
00160     md = modifiers_getVirtualModifierList(ob);
00161 
00162     /* exception for shape keys because we can edit those */
00163     for (; md; md = md->next) {
00164         ModifierTypeInfo *mti = modifierType_getInfo(md->type);
00165         if (!modifier_isEnabled(scene, md, eModifierMode_Realtime)) continue;
00166         if (md->type == eModifierType_ShapeKey) continue;
00167 
00168         if (mti->type == eModifierTypeType_OnlyDeform) return 1;
00169         else if ((sd->flags & SCULPT_ONLY_DEFORM) == 0) return 1;
00170     }
00171 
00172     return 0;
00173 }

00181 /* Cache stroke properties. Used because
00182  * RNA property lookup isn't particularly fast.
00183  *
00184  * For descriptions of these settings, check the operator properties.
00185  */
00186 typedef struct StrokeCache {
00187     /* Invariants */
00188     float initial_radius;
00189     float scale[3];
00190     int flag;
00191     float clip_tolerance[3];
00192     float initial_mouse[2];
00193 
00194     /* Variants */
00195     float radius;
00196     float radius_squared;
00197     float true_location[3];
00198     float location[3];
00199 
00200     float pen_flip;
00201     float invert;
00202     float pressure;
00203     float mouse[2];
00204     float bstrength;
00205     float tex_mouse[2];
00206 
00207     /* The rest is temporary storage that isn't saved as a property */
00208 
00209     int first_time; /* Beginning of stroke may do some things special */
00210 
00211     /* from ED_view3d_ob_project_mat_get() */
00212     float projection_mat[4][4];
00213 
00214     /* Clean this up! */
00215     ViewContext *vc;
00216     Brush *brush;
00217 
00218     float (*face_norms)[3]; /* Copy of the mesh faces' normals */
00219     float special_rotation; /* Texture rotation (radians) for anchored and rake modes */
00220     int pixel_radius, previous_pixel_radius;
00221     float grab_delta[3], grab_delta_symmetry[3];
00222     float old_grab_location[3], orig_grab_location[3];
00223 
00224     int symmetry; /* Symmetry index between 0 and 7 bit combo 0 is Brush only;
00225                    * 1 is X mirror; 2 is Y mirror; 3 is XY; 4 is Z; 5 is XZ; 6 is YZ; 7 is XYZ */
00226     int mirror_symmetry_pass; /* the symmetry pass we are currently on between 0 and 7*/
00227     float true_view_normal[3];
00228     float view_normal[3];
00229     float last_area_normal[3];
00230     float last_center[3];
00231     int radial_symmetry_pass;
00232     float symm_rot_mat[4][4];
00233     float symm_rot_mat_inv[4][4];
00234     float last_rake[2]; /* Last location of updating rake rotation */
00235     int original;
00236 
00237     float vertex_rotation;
00238 
00239     char saved_active_brush_name[MAX_ID_NAME];
00240     int alt_smooth;
00241 
00242     float plane_trim_squared;
00243 
00244     rcti previous_r; /* previous redraw rectangle */
00245 } StrokeCache;

00249 /* Get a screen-space rectangle of the modified area */
00250 static int sculpt_get_redraw_rect(ARegion *ar, RegionView3D *rv3d,
00251                                   Object *ob, rcti *rect)
00252 {
00253     SculptSession *ss;
00254     PBVH *pbvh = ob->sculpt->pbvh;
00255     float bb_min[3], bb_max[3];
00256 
00257     if (!pbvh)
00258         return 0;
00259 
00260     BLI_pbvh_redraw_BB(pbvh, bb_min, bb_max);
00261 
00262     /* convert 3D bounding box to screen space */
00263     if (!paint_convert_bb_to_rect(rect,
00264                                   bb_min,
00265                                   bb_max,
00266                                   ar,
00267                                   rv3d,
00268                                   ob)) {
00269         return 0;
00270     }
00271 
00272     /* expand redraw rect with redraw rect from previous step to
00273      * prevent partial-redraw issues caused by fast strokes. This is
00274      * needed here (not in sculpt_flush_update) as it was before
00275      * because redraw rectangle should be the same in both of
00276      * optimized PBVH draw function and 3d view redraw (if not -- some
00277      * mesh parts could disappear from screen (sergey) */
00278     ss = ob->sculpt;
00279     if (ss->cache) {
00280         if (!BLI_rcti_is_empty(&ss->cache->previous_r))
00281             BLI_union_rcti(rect, &ss->cache->previous_r);
00282     }
00283 
00284     return 1;
00285 }
00286 
00287 void sculpt_get_redraw_planes(float planes[4][4], ARegion *ar,
00288                               RegionView3D *rv3d, Object *ob)
00289 {
00290     PBVH *pbvh = ob->sculpt->pbvh;
00291     rcti rect;
00292 
00293     sculpt_get_redraw_rect(ar, rv3d, ob, &rect);
00294 
00295     paint_calc_redraw_planes(planes, ar, rv3d, ob, &rect);
00296 
00297     /* clear redraw flag from nodes */
00298     if (pbvh)
00299         BLI_pbvh_update(pbvh, PBVH_UpdateRedraw, NULL);
00300 }

00304 typedef struct SculptBrushTest {
00305     float radius_squared;
00306     float location[3];
00307     float dist;
00308 } SculptBrushTest;
00309 
00310 static void sculpt_brush_test_init(SculptSession *ss, SculptBrushTest *test)
00311 {
00312     test->radius_squared = ss->cache->radius_squared;
00313     copy_v3_v3(test->location, ss->cache->location);
00314     test->dist = 0.0f;   /* just for initialize */
00315 }
00316 
00317 static int sculpt_brush_test(SculptBrushTest *test, float co[3])
00318 {
00319     float distsq = len_squared_v3v3(co, test->location);
00320 
00321     if (distsq <= test->radius_squared) {
00322         test->dist = sqrt(distsq);
00323         return 1;
00324     }
00325     else {
00326         return 0;
00327     }
00328 }
00329 
00330 static int sculpt_brush_test_sq(SculptBrushTest *test, float co[3])
00331 {
00332     float distsq = len_squared_v3v3(co, test->location);
00333 
00334     if (distsq <= test->radius_squared) {
00335         test->dist = distsq;
00336         return 1;
00337     }
00338     else {
00339         return 0;
00340     }
00341 }
00342 
00343 static int sculpt_brush_test_fast(SculptBrushTest *test, float co[3])
00344 {
00345     return len_squared_v3v3(co, test->location) <= test->radius_squared;
00346 }
00347 
00348 static int sculpt_brush_test_cube(SculptBrushTest *test, float co[3], float local[4][4])
00349 {
00350     float side = M_SQRT1_2;
00351     float local_co[3];
00352 
00353     mul_v3_m4v3(local_co, local, co);
00354 
00355     local_co[0] = fabs(local_co[0]);
00356     local_co[1] = fabs(local_co[1]);
00357     local_co[2] = fabs(local_co[2]);
00358 
00359     if (local_co[0] <= side && local_co[1] <= side && local_co[2] <= side) {
00360         float p = 4;
00361         
00362         test->dist = ((powf(local_co[0], p) +
00363                        powf(local_co[1], p) +
00364                        powf(local_co[2], p)) / pow(side, p));
00365 
00366         return 1;
00367     }
00368     else {
00369         return 0;
00370     }
00371 }
00372 
00373 static float frontface(Brush *brush, const float sculpt_normal[3],
00374                        const short no[3], const float fno[3])
00375 {
00376     if (brush->flag & BRUSH_FRONTFACE) {
00377         float dot;
00378 
00379         if (no) {
00380             float tmp[3];
00381 
00382             normal_short_to_float_v3(tmp, no);
00383             dot = dot_v3v3(tmp, sculpt_normal);
00384         }
00385         else {
00386             dot = dot_v3v3(fno, sculpt_normal);
00387         }
00388         return dot > 0 ? dot : 0;
00389     }
00390     else {
00391         return 1;
00392     }
00393 }

00397 static int sculpt_brush_test_cyl(SculptBrushTest *test, float co[3], float location[3], float an[3])
00398 {
00399     if (sculpt_brush_test_fast(test, co)) {
00400         float t1[3], t2[3], t3[3], dist;
00401 
00402         sub_v3_v3v3(t1, location, co);
00403         sub_v3_v3v3(t2, x2, location);
00404 
00405         cross_v3_v3v3(t3, an, t1);
00406 
00407         dist = len_v3(t3) / len_v3(t2);
00408 
00409         test->dist = dist;
00410 
00411         return 1;
00412     }
00413 
00414     return 0;
00415 }

00424 static float overlapped_curve(Brush *br, float x)
00425 {
00426     int i;
00427     const int n = 100 / br->spacing;
00428     const float h = br->spacing / 50.0f;
00429     const float x0 = x - 1;
00430 
00431     float sum;
00432 
00433     sum = 0;
00434     for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00435         float xx;
00436 
00437         xx = fabs(x0 + i * h);
00438 
00439         if (xx < 1.0f)
00440             sum += brush_curve_strength(br, xx, 1);
00441     }
00442 
00443     return sum;
00444 }
00445 
00446 static float integrate_overlap(Brush *br)
00447 {
00448     int i;
00449     int m = 10;
00450     float g = 1.0f / m;
00451     float max;
00452 
00453     max = 0;
00454     for (i = 0; i < m; i++) {
00455         float overlap = overlapped_curve(br, i * g);
00456 
00457         if (overlap > max)
00458             max = overlap;
00459     }
00460 
00461     return max;
00462 }
00463 
00464 /* Uses symm to selectively flip any axis of a coordinate. */
00465 static void flip_coord(float out[3], float in[3], const char symm)
00466 {
00467     if (symm & SCULPT_SYMM_X)
00468         out[0] = -in[0];
00469     else
00470         out[0] = in[0];
00471     if (symm & SCULPT_SYMM_Y)
00472         out[1] = -in[1];
00473     else
00474         out[1] = in[1];
00475     if (symm & SCULPT_SYMM_Z)
00476         out[2] = -in[2];
00477     else
00478         out[2] = in[2];
00479 }
00480 
00481 static float calc_overlap(StrokeCache *cache, const char symm, const char axis, const float angle)
00482 {
00483     float mirror[3];
00484     float distsq;
00485     
00486     /* flip_coord(mirror, cache->traced_location, symm); */
00487     flip_coord(mirror, cache->true_location, symm);
00488 
00489     if (axis != 0) {
00490         float mat[4][4] = MAT4_UNITY;
00491         rotate_m4(mat, axis, angle);
00492         mul_m4_v3(mat, mirror);
00493     }
00494 
00495     /* distsq = len_squared_v3v3(mirror, cache->traced_location); */
00496     distsq = len_squared_v3v3(mirror, cache->true_location);
00497 
00498     if (distsq <= 4.0f * (cache->radius_squared))
00499         return (2.0f * (cache->radius) - sqrtf(distsq))  /  (2.0f * (cache->radius));
00500     else
00501         return 0;
00502 }
00503 
00504 static float calc_radial_symmetry_feather(Sculpt *sd, StrokeCache *cache, const char symm, const char axis)
00505 {
00506     int i;
00507     float overlap;
00508 
00509     overlap = 0;
00510     for (i = 1; i < sd->radial_symm[axis - 'X']; ++i) {
00511         const float angle = 2 * M_PI * i / sd->radial_symm[axis - 'X'];
00512         overlap += calc_overlap(cache, symm, axis, angle);
00513     }
00514 
00515     return overlap;
00516 }
00517 
00518 static float calc_symmetry_feather(Sculpt *sd, StrokeCache *cache)
00519 {
00520     if (sd->flags & SCULPT_SYMMETRY_FEATHER) {
00521         float overlap;
00522         int symm = cache->symmetry;
00523         int i;
00524 
00525         overlap = 0;
00526         for (i = 0; i <= symm; i++) {
00527             if (i == 0 || (symm & i && (symm != 5 || i != 3) && (symm != 6 || (i != 3 && i != 5)))) {
00528 
00529                 overlap += calc_overlap(cache, i, 0, 0);
00530 
00531                 overlap += calc_radial_symmetry_feather(sd, cache, i, 'X');
00532                 overlap += calc_radial_symmetry_feather(sd, cache, i, 'Y');
00533                 overlap += calc_radial_symmetry_feather(sd, cache, i, 'Z');
00534             }
00535         }
00536 
00537         return 1 / overlap;
00538     }
00539     else {
00540         return 1;
00541     }
00542 }
00543 
00544 /* Return modified brush strength. Includes the direction of the brush, positive
00545  * values pull vertices, negative values push. Uses tablet pressure and a
00546  * special multiplier found experimentally to scale the strength factor. */
00547 static float brush_strength(Sculpt *sd, StrokeCache *cache, float feather)
00548 {
00549     const Scene *scene = cache->vc->scene;
00550     Brush *brush = paint_brush(&sd->paint);
00551 
00552     /* Primary strength input; square it to make lower values more sensitive */
00553     const float root_alpha = brush_alpha(scene, brush);
00554     float alpha        = root_alpha * root_alpha;
00555     float dir          = brush->flag & BRUSH_DIR_IN ? -1 : 1;
00556     float pressure     = brush_use_alpha_pressure(scene, brush) ? cache->pressure : 1;
00557     float pen_flip     = cache->pen_flip ? -1 : 1;
00558     float invert       = cache->invert ? -1 : 1;
00559     float accum        = integrate_overlap(brush);
00560     /* spacing is integer percentage of radius, divide by 50 to get
00561      * normalized diameter */
00562     float overlap      = (brush->flag & BRUSH_SPACE_ATTEN &&
00563                           brush->flag & BRUSH_SPACE &&
00564                           !(brush->flag & BRUSH_ANCHORED) &&
00565                           (brush->spacing < 100)) ? 1.0f / accum : 1;
00566     float flip         = dir * invert * pen_flip;
00567 
00568     switch (brush->sculpt_tool) {
00569         case SCULPT_TOOL_CLAY:
00570         case SCULPT_TOOL_CLAY_STRIPS:
00571         case SCULPT_TOOL_DRAW:
00572         case SCULPT_TOOL_LAYER:
00573             return alpha * flip * pressure * overlap * feather;
00574 
00575         case SCULPT_TOOL_CREASE:
00576         case SCULPT_TOOL_BLOB:
00577             return alpha * flip * pressure * overlap * feather;
00578 
00579         case SCULPT_TOOL_INFLATE:
00580             if (flip > 0) {
00581                 return 0.250f * alpha * flip * pressure * overlap * feather;
00582             }
00583             else {
00584                 return 0.125f * alpha * flip * pressure * overlap * feather;
00585             }
00586 
00587         case SCULPT_TOOL_FILL:
00588         case SCULPT_TOOL_SCRAPE:
00589         case SCULPT_TOOL_FLATTEN:
00590             if (flip > 0) {
00591                 overlap = (1 + overlap) / 2;
00592                 return alpha * flip * pressure * overlap * feather;
00593             }
00594             else {
00595                 /* reduce strength for DEEPEN, PEAKS, and CONTRAST */
00596                 return 0.5f * alpha * flip * pressure * overlap * feather; 
00597             }
00598 
00599         case SCULPT_TOOL_SMOOTH:
00600             return alpha * pressure * feather;
00601 
00602         case SCULPT_TOOL_PINCH:
00603             if (flip > 0) {
00604                 return alpha * flip * pressure * overlap * feather;
00605             }
00606             else {
00607                 return 0.25f * alpha * flip * pressure * overlap * feather;
00608             }
00609 
00610         case SCULPT_TOOL_NUDGE:
00611             overlap = (1 + overlap) / 2;
00612             return alpha * pressure * overlap * feather;
00613 
00614         case SCULPT_TOOL_THUMB:
00615             return alpha * pressure * feather;
00616 
00617         case SCULPT_TOOL_SNAKE_HOOK:
00618             return feather;
00619 
00620         case SCULPT_TOOL_GRAB:
00621             return feather;
00622 
00623         case SCULPT_TOOL_ROTATE:
00624             return alpha * pressure * feather;
00625 
00626         default:
00627             return 0;
00628     }
00629 }
00630 
00631 /* Return a multiplier for brush strength on a particular vertex. */
00632 static float tex_strength(SculptSession *ss, Brush *br, float point[3],
00633                           const float len,
00634                           const float sculpt_normal[3],
00635                           const short vno[3],
00636                           const float fno[3])
00637 {
00638     MTex *mtex = &br->mtex;
00639     float avg = 1;
00640 
00641     if (!mtex->tex) {
00642         avg = 1;
00643     }
00644     else if (mtex->brush_map_mode == MTEX_MAP_MODE_3D) {
00645         float jnk;
00646 
00647         /* Get strength by feeding the vertex 
00648          * location directly into a texture */
00649         externtex(mtex, point, &avg,
00650                   &jnk, &jnk, &jnk, &jnk, 0);
00651     }
00652     else if (ss->texcache) {
00653         float rotation = -mtex->rot;
00654         float symm_point[3], point_2d[2];
00655         float x, y;
00656         float radius;
00657 
00658         /* if the active area is being applied for symmetry, flip it
00659          * across the symmetry axis and rotate it back to the original
00660          * position in order to project it. This insures that the 
00661          * brush texture will be oriented correctly. */
00662 
00663         flip_coord(symm_point, point, ss->cache->mirror_symmetry_pass);
00664 
00665         if (ss->cache->radial_symmetry_pass)
00666             mul_m4_v3(ss->cache->symm_rot_mat_inv, symm_point);
00667 
00668         ED_view3d_project_float_v2(ss->cache->vc->ar, symm_point, point_2d, ss->cache->projection_mat);
00669 
00670         /* if fixed mode, keep coordinates relative to mouse */
00671         if (mtex->brush_map_mode == MTEX_MAP_MODE_FIXED) {
00672             rotation += ss->cache->special_rotation;
00673 
00674             point_2d[0] -= ss->cache->tex_mouse[0];
00675             point_2d[1] -= ss->cache->tex_mouse[1];
00676 
00677             /* use pressure adjusted size for fixed mode */
00678             radius = ss->cache->pixel_radius;
00679 
00680             x = point_2d[0] + ss->cache->vc->ar->winrct.xmin;
00681             y = point_2d[1] + ss->cache->vc->ar->winrct.ymin;
00682         }
00683         else { /* else (mtex->brush_map_mode == MTEX_MAP_MODE_TILED) */
00684                /* leave the coordinates relative to the screen */
00685 
00686             /* use unadjusted size for tiled mode */
00687             radius = brush_size(ss->cache->vc->scene, br);
00688         
00689             x = point_2d[0];
00690             y = point_2d[1];
00691         }
00692 
00693         x /= ss->cache->vc->ar->winx;
00694         y /= ss->cache->vc->ar->winy;
00695 
00696         if (mtex->brush_map_mode == MTEX_MAP_MODE_TILED) {
00697             x -= 0.5f;
00698             y -= 0.5f;
00699         }
00700         
00701         x *= ss->cache->vc->ar->winx / radius;
00702         y *= ss->cache->vc->ar->winy / radius;
00703 
00704         /* it is probably worth optimizing for those cases where 
00705          * the texture is not rotated by skipping the calls to
00706          * atan2, sqrtf, sin, and cos. */
00707         if (rotation > 0.001f || rotation < -0.001f) {
00708             const float angle    = atan2f(y, x) + rotation;
00709             const float flen     = sqrtf(x * x + y * y);
00710 
00711             x = flen * cosf(angle);
00712             y = flen * sinf(angle);
00713         }
00714 
00715         x *= br->mtex.size[0];
00716         y *= br->mtex.size[1];
00717 
00718         x += br->mtex.ofs[0];
00719         y += br->mtex.ofs[1];
00720 
00721         avg = paint_get_tex_pixel(br, x, y);
00722     }
00723 
00724     avg += br->texture_sample_bias;
00725 
00726     /* Falloff curve */
00727     avg *= brush_curve_strength(br, len, ss->cache->radius);
00728 
00729     avg *= frontface(br, sculpt_normal, vno, fno);
00730 
00731     return avg;
00732 }
00733 
00734 typedef struct {
00735     Sculpt *sd;
00736     SculptSession *ss;
00737     float radius_squared;
00738     int original;
00739 } SculptSearchSphereData;
00740 
00741 /* Test AABB against sphere */
00742 static int sculpt_search_sphere_cb(PBVHNode *node, void *data_v)
00743 {
00744     SculptSearchSphereData *data = data_v;
00745     float *center = data->ss->cache->location, nearest[3];
00746     float t[3], bb_min[3], bb_max[3];
00747     int i;
00748 
00749     if (data->original)
00750         BLI_pbvh_node_get_original_BB(node, bb_min, bb_max);
00751     else
00752         BLI_pbvh_node_get_BB(node, bb_min, bb_max);
00753     
00754     for (i = 0; i < 3; ++i) {
00755         if (bb_min[i] > center[i])
00756             nearest[i] = bb_min[i];
00757         else if (bb_max[i] < center[i])
00758             nearest[i] = bb_max[i];
00759         else
00760             nearest[i] = center[i]; 
00761     }
00762     
00763     sub_v3_v3v3(t, center, nearest);
00764 
00765     return dot_v3v3(t, t) < data->radius_squared;
00766 }
00767 
00768 /* Handles clipping against a mirror modifier and SCULPT_LOCK axis flags */
00769 static void sculpt_clip(Sculpt *sd, SculptSession *ss, float *co, const float val[3])
00770 {
00771     int i;
00772 
00773     for (i = 0; i < 3; ++i) {
00774         if (sd->flags & (SCULPT_LOCK_X << i))
00775             continue;
00776 
00777         if ((ss->cache->flag & (CLIP_X << i)) && (fabsf(co[i]) <= ss->cache->clip_tolerance[i]))
00778             co[i] = 0.0f;
00779         else
00780             co[i] = val[i];
00781     }
00782 }
00783 
00784 static void add_norm_if(float view_vec[3], float out[3], float out_flip[3], float fno[3])
00785 {
00786     if ((dot_v3v3(view_vec, fno)) > 0) {
00787         add_v3_v3(out, fno);
00788     }
00789     else {
00790         add_v3_v3(out_flip, fno); /* out_flip is used when out is {0,0,0} */
00791     }
00792 }
00793 
00794 static void calc_area_normal(Sculpt *sd, Object *ob, float an[3], PBVHNode **nodes, int totnode)
00795 {
00796     SculptSession *ss = ob->sculpt;
00797     int n;
00798 
00799     float out_flip[3] = {0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f};
00800 
00801     (void)sd; /* unused w/o openmp */
00802     
00803     zero_v3(an);
00804 
00805     #pragma omp parallel for schedule(guided) if (sd->flags & SCULPT_USE_OPENMP)
00806     for (n = 0; n < totnode; n++) {
00807         PBVHVertexIter vd;
00808         SculptBrushTest test;
00809         SculptUndoNode *unode;
00810         float private_an[3] = {0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f};
00811         float private_out_flip[3] = {0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f};
00812 
00813         unode = sculpt_undo_push_node(ob, nodes[n], SCULPT_UNDO_COORDS);
00814         sculpt_brush_test_init(ss, &test);
00815 
00816         if (ss->cache->original) {
00817             BLI_pbvh_vertex_iter_begin(ss->pbvh, nodes[n], vd, PBVH_ITER_UNIQUE) {
00818                 if (sculpt_brush_test_fast(&test, unode->co[vd.i])) {
00819                     float fno[3];
00820 
00821                     normal_short_to_float_v3(fno, unode->no[vd.i]);
00822                     add_norm_if(ss->cache->view_normal, private_an, private_out_flip, fno);
00823                 }
00824             }
00825             BLI_pbvh_vertex_iter_end;
00826         }
00827         else {
00828             BLI_pbvh_vertex_iter_begin(ss->pbvh, nodes[n], vd, PBVH_ITER_UNIQUE) {
00829                 if (sculpt_brush_test_fast(&test, vd.co)) {
00830                     if (vd.no) {
00831                         float fno[3];
00832 
00833                         normal_short_to_float_v3(fno, vd.no);
00834                         add_norm_if(ss->cache->view_normal, private_an, private_out_flip, fno);
00835                     }
00836                     else {
00837                         add_norm_if(ss->cache->view_normal, private_an, private_out_flip, vd.fno);
00838                     }
00839                 }
00840             }
00841             BLI_pbvh_vertex_iter_end;
00842         }
00843 
00844         #pragma omp critical
00845         {
00846             add_v3_v3(an, private_an);
00847             add_v3_v3(out_flip, private_out_flip);
00848         }
00849     }
00850 
00851     if (is_zero_v3(an))
00852         copy_v3_v3(an, out_flip);
00853 
00854     normalize_v3(an);
00855 }
00856 
00857 /* This initializes the faces to be moved for this sculpt for draw/layer/flatten; then it
00858  * finds average normal for all active vertices - note that this is called once for each mirroring direction */
00859 static void calc_sculpt_normal(Sculpt *sd, Object *ob, float an[3], PBVHNode **nodes, int totnode)
00860 {
00861     SculptSession *ss = ob->sculpt;
00862     Brush *brush = paint_brush(&sd->paint);
00863 
00864     if (ss->cache->mirror_symmetry_pass == 0 &&
00865         ss->cache->radial_symmetry_pass == 0 &&
00866         (ss->cache->first_time || !(brush->flag & BRUSH_ORIGINAL_NORMAL)))
00867     {
00868         switch (brush->sculpt_plane) {
00869             case SCULPT_DISP_DIR_VIEW:
00870                 ED_view3d_global_to_vector(ss->cache->vc->rv3d, ss->cache->vc->rv3d->twmat[3], an);
00871                 break;
00872 
00873             case SCULPT_DISP_DIR_X:
00874                 an[1] = 0.0;
00875                 an[2] = 0.0;
00876                 an[0] = 1.0;
00877                 break;
00878 
00879             case SCULPT_DISP_DIR_Y:
00880                 an[0] = 0.0;
00881                 an[2] = 0.0;
00882                 an[1] = 1.0;
00883                 break;
00884 
00885             case SCULPT_DISP_DIR_Z:
00886                 an[0] = 0.0;
00887                 an[1] = 0.0;
00888                 an[2] = 1.0;
00889                 break;
00890 
00891             case SCULPT_DISP_DIR_AREA:
00892                 calc_area_normal(sd, ob, an, nodes, totnode);
00893 
00894             default:
00895                 break;
00896         }
00897 
00898         copy_v3_v3(ss->cache->last_area_normal, an);
00899     }
00900     else {
00901         copy_v3_v3(an, ss->cache->last_area_normal);
00902         flip_coord(an, an, ss->cache->mirror_symmetry_pass);
00903         mul_m4_v3(ss->cache->symm_rot_mat, an);
00904     }
00905 }
00906 
00907 /* For the smooth brush, uses the neighboring vertices around vert to calculate
00908  * a smoothed location for vert. Skips corner vertices (used by only one
00909  * polygon.) */
00910 static void neighbor_average(SculptSession *ss, float avg[3], unsigned vert)
00911 {
00912     const MeshElemMap *vert_map = &ss->pmap[vert];
00913     const MVert *mvert = ss->mvert;
00914     float (*deform_co)[3] = ss->deform_cos;
00915 
00916     zero_v3(avg);
00917         
00918     /* Don't modify corner vertices */
00919     if (vert_map->count > 1) {
00920         int i, total = 0;
00921 
00922         for (i = 0; i < vert_map->count; i++) {
00923             const MPoly *p = &ss->mpoly[vert_map->indices[i]];
00924             unsigned f_adj_v[3];
00925 
00926             if (poly_get_adj_loops_from_vert(f_adj_v, p, ss->mloop, vert) != -1) {
00927                 int j;
00928             
00929                 for (j = 0; j < 3; j++) {
00930                     if (vert_map->count != 2 || ss->pmap[f_adj_v[j]].count <= 2) {
00931                         add_v3_v3(avg, deform_co ? deform_co[f_adj_v[j]] :
00932                                   mvert[f_adj_v[j]].co);
00933 
00934                         total++;
00935                     }
00936                 }
00937             }
00938         }
00939 
00940         if (total > 0) {
00941             mul_v3_fl(avg, 1.0f / total);
00942             return;
00943         }
00944     }
00945 
00946     copy_v3_v3(avg, deform_co ? deform_co[vert] : mvert[vert].co);
00947 }
00948 
00949 static void do_mesh_smooth_brush(Sculpt *sd, SculptSession *ss, PBVHNode *node, float bstrength)
00950 {
00951     Brush *brush = paint_brush(&sd->paint);
00952     PBVHVertexIter vd;
00953     SculptBrushTest test;
00954     
00955     CLAMP(bstrength, 0.0f, 1.0f);
00956 
00957     sculpt_brush_test_init(ss, &test);
00958 
00959     BLI_pbvh_vertex_iter_begin(ss->pbvh, node, vd, PBVH_ITER_UNIQUE) {
00960         if (sculpt_brush_test(&test, vd.co)) {
00961             const float fade = bstrength * tex_strength(ss, brush, vd.co, test.dist,
00962                                                         ss->cache->view_normal, vd.no, vd.fno);
00963             float avg[3], val[3];
00964 
00965             neighbor_average(ss, avg, vd.vert_indices[vd.i]);
00966             sub_v3_v3v3(val, avg, vd.co);
00967             mul_v3_fl(val, fade);
00968 
00969             add_v3_v3(val, vd.co);
00970 
00971             sculpt_clip(sd, ss, vd.co, val);
00972 
00973             if (vd.mvert)
00974                 vd.mvert->flag |= ME_VERT_PBVH_UPDATE;
00975         }
00976     }
00977     BLI_pbvh_vertex_iter_end;
00978 }
00979 
00980 static void do_multires_smooth_brush(Sculpt *sd, SculptSession *ss, PBVHNode *node, float bstrength)
00981 {
00982     Brush *brush = paint_brush(&sd->paint);
00983     SculptBrushTest test;
00984     DMGridData **griddata, *data;
00985     DMGridAdjacency *gridadj, *adj;
00986     float (*tmpgrid)[3], (*tmprow)[3];
00987     int v1, v2, v3, v4;
00988     int *grid_indices, totgrid, gridsize, i, x, y;
00989 
00990     sculpt_brush_test_init(ss, &test);
00991 
00992     CLAMP(bstrength, 0.0f, 1.0f);
00993 
00994     BLI_pbvh_node_get_grids(ss->pbvh, node, &grid_indices, &totgrid,
00995                             NULL, &gridsize, &griddata, &gridadj);
00996 
00997     #pragma omp critical
00998     {
00999         tmpgrid = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(float) * 3 * gridsize * gridsize, "tmpgrid");
01000         tmprow =  MEM_mallocN(sizeof(float) * 3 * gridsize, "tmprow");
01001     }
01002 
01003     for (i = 0; i < totgrid; ++i) {
01004         data = griddata[grid_indices[i]];
01005         adj = &gridadj[grid_indices[i]];
01006 
01007         memset(tmpgrid, 0, sizeof(float) * 3 * gridsize * gridsize);
01008 
01009         for (y = 0; y < gridsize - 1; y++) {
01010             float tmp[3];
01011 
01012             v1 = y * gridsize;
01013             add_v3_v3v3(tmprow[0], data[v1].co, data[v1 + gridsize].co);
01014 
01015             for (x = 0; x < gridsize - 1; x++) {
01016                 v1 = x + y * gridsize;
01017                 v2 = v1 + 1;
01018                 v3 = v1 + gridsize;
01019                 v4 = v3 + 1;
01020 
01021                 add_v3_v3v3(tmprow[x + 1], data[v2].co, data[v4].co);
01022                 add_v3_v3v3(tmp, tmprow[x + 1], tmprow[x]);
01023 
01024                 add_v3_v3(tmpgrid[v1], tmp);
01025                 add_v3_v3(tmpgrid[v2], tmp);
01026                 add_v3_v3(tmpgrid[v3], tmp);
01027                 add_v3_v3(tmpgrid[v4], tmp);
01028             }
01029         }
01030 
01031         /* blend with existing coordinates */
01032         for (y = 0; y < gridsize; ++y) {
01033             for (x = 0; x < gridsize; ++x) {
01034                 float *co;
01035                 float *fno;
01036                 int index;
01037 
01038                 if (x == 0 && adj->index[0] == -1)
01039                     continue;
01040 
01041                 if (x == gridsize - 1 && adj->index[2] == -1)
01042                     continue;
01043 
01044                 if (y == 0 && adj->index[3] == -1)
01045                     continue;
01046 
01047                 if (y == gridsize - 1 && adj->index[1] == -1)
01048                     continue;
01049 
01050                 index = x + y * gridsize;
01051                 co =  data[index].co;
01052                 fno = data[index].no;
01053 
01054                 if (sculpt_brush_test(&test, co)) {
01055                     const float fade = bstrength * tex_strength(ss, brush, co, test.dist,
01056                                                                 ss->cache->view_normal, NULL, fno);
01057                     float *avg, val[3];
01058                     float n;
01059 
01060                     avg = tmpgrid[x + y * gridsize];
01061 
01062                     n = 1 / 16.0f;
01063 
01064                     if (x == 0 || x == gridsize - 1)
01065                         n *= 2;
01066 
01067                     if (y == 0 || y == gridsize - 1)
01068                         n *= 2;
01069 
01070                     mul_v3_fl(avg, n);
01071 
01072                     sub_v3_v3v3(val, avg, co);
01073                     mul_v3_fl(val, fade);
01074 
01075                     add_v3_v3(val, co);
01076 
01077                     sculpt_clip(sd, ss, co, val);
01078                 }
01079             }
01080         }
01081     }
01082 
01083     #pragma omp critical
01084     {
01085         MEM_freeN(tmpgrid);
01086         MEM_freeN(tmprow);
01087     }
01088 }
01089 
01090 static void smooth(Sculpt *sd, Object *ob, PBVHNode **nodes, int totnode, float bstrength)
01091 {
01092     SculptSession *ss = ob->sculpt;
01093     const int max_iterations = 4;
01094     const float fract = 1.0f / max_iterations;
01095     int iteration, n, count;
01096     float last;
01097 
01098     CLAMP(bstrength, 0, 1);
01099 
01100     count = (int)(bstrength * max_iterations);
01101     last  = max_iterations * (bstrength - count * fract);
01102 
01103     for (iteration = 0; iteration <= count; ++iteration) {
01104         #pragma omp parallel for schedule(guided) if (sd->flags & SCULPT_USE_OPENMP)
01105         for (n = 0; n < totnode; n++) {
01106             if (ss->multires) {
01107                 do_multires_smooth_brush(sd, ss, nodes[n], iteration != count ? 1.0f : last);
01108             }
01109             else if (ss->pmap)
01110                 do_mesh_smooth_brush(sd, ss, nodes[n], iteration != count ? 1.0f : last);
01111         }
01112 
01113         if (ss->multires)
01114             multires_stitch_grids(ob);
01115     }
01116 }
01117 
01118 static void do_smooth_brush(Sculpt *sd, Object *ob, PBVHNode **nodes, int totnode)
01119 {
01120     SculptSession *ss = ob->sculpt;
01121     smooth(sd, ob, nodes, totnode, ss->cache->bstrength);
01122 }
01123 
01124 static void do_draw_brush(Sculpt *sd, Object *ob, PBVHNode **nodes, int totnode)
01125 {
01126     SculptSession *ss = ob->sculpt;
01127     Brush *brush = paint_brush(&sd->paint);
01128     float offset[3], area_normal[3];
01129     float bstrength = ss->cache->bstrength;
01130     int n;
01131 
01132     calc_sculpt_normal(sd, ob, area_normal, nodes, totnode);
01133     
01134     /* offset with as much as possible factored in already */
01135     mul_v3_v3fl(offset, area_normal, ss->cache->radius);
01136     mul_v3_v3(offset, ss->cache->scale);
01137     mul_v3_fl(offset, bstrength);
01138 
01139     /* threaded loop over nodes */
01140     #pragma omp parallel for schedule(guided) if (sd->flags & SCULPT_USE_OPENMP)
01141     for (n = 0; n < totnode; n++) {
01142         PBVHVertexIter vd;
01143         SculptBrushTest test;
01144         float (*proxy)[3];
01145 
01146         proxy = BLI_pbvh_node_add_proxy(ss->pbvh, nodes[n])->co;
01147 
01148         sculpt_brush_test_init(ss, &test);
01149 
01150         BLI_pbvh_vertex_iter_begin(ss->pbvh, nodes[n], vd, PBVH_ITER_UNIQUE) {
01151             if (sculpt_brush_test(&test, vd.co)) {
01152                 /* offset vertex */
01153                 float fade = tex_strength(ss, brush, vd.co, test.dist,
01154                                           area_normal, vd.no, vd.fno);
01155 
01156                 mul_v3_v3fl(proxy[vd.i], offset, fade);
01157 
01158                 if (vd.mvert)
01159                     vd.mvert->flag |= ME_VERT_PBVH_UPDATE;
01160             }
01161         }
01162         BLI_pbvh_vertex_iter_end;
01163     }
01164 }
01165 
01166 static void do_crease_brush(Sculpt *sd, Object *ob, PBVHNode **nodes, int totnode)
01167 {
01168     SculptSession *ss = ob->sculpt;
01169     const Scene *scene = ss->cache->vc->scene;
01170     Brush *brush = paint_brush(&sd->paint);
01171     float offset[3], area_normal[3];
01172     float bstrength = ss->cache->bstrength;
01173     float flippedbstrength, crease_correction;
01174     int n;
01175 
01176     calc_sculpt_normal(sd, ob, area_normal, nodes, totnode);
01177     
01178     /* offset with as much as possible factored in already */
01179     mul_v3_v3fl(offset, area_normal, ss->cache->radius);
01180     mul_v3_v3(offset, ss->cache->scale);
01181     mul_v3_fl(offset, bstrength);
01182     
01183     /* we divide out the squared alpha and multiply by the squared crease to give us the pinch strength */
01184     
01185     if (brush_alpha(scene, brush) > 0.0f)
01186         crease_correction = brush->crease_pinch_factor * brush->crease_pinch_factor / (brush_alpha(scene, brush) * brush_alpha(scene, brush));
01187     else
01188         crease_correction = brush->crease_pinch_factor * brush->crease_pinch_factor;
01189 
01190     /* we always want crease to pinch or blob to relax even when draw is negative */
01191     flippedbstrength = (bstrength < 0) ? -crease_correction * bstrength : crease_correction * bstrength;
01192 
01193     if (brush->sculpt_tool == SCULPT_TOOL_BLOB) flippedbstrength *= -1.0f;
01194 
01195     /* threaded loop over nodes */
01196     #pragma omp parallel for schedule(guided) if (sd->flags & SCULPT_USE_OPENMP)
01197     for (n = 0; n < totnode; n++) {
01198         PBVHVertexIter vd;
01199         SculptBrushTest test;
01200         float (*proxy)[3];
01201 
01202         proxy = BLI_pbvh_node_add_proxy(ss->pbvh, nodes[n])->co;
01203 
01204         sculpt_brush_test_init(ss, &test);
01205 
01206         BLI_pbvh_vertex_iter_begin(ss->pbvh, nodes[n], vd, PBVH_ITER_UNIQUE) {
01207             if (sculpt_brush_test(&test, vd.co)) {
01208                 /* offset vertex */
01209                 const float fade = tex_strength(ss, brush, vd.co, test.dist,
01210                                                 area_normal, vd.no, vd.fno);
01211                 float val1[3];
01212                 float val2[3];
01213 
01214                 /* first we pinch */
01215                 sub_v3_v3v3(val1, test.location, vd.co);
01216                 mul_v3_fl(val1, fade * flippedbstrength);
01217 
01218                 /* then we draw */
01219                 mul_v3_v3fl(val2, offset, fade);
01220 
01221                 add_v3_v3v3(proxy[vd.i], val1, val2);
01222 
01223                 if (vd.mvert)
01224                     vd.mvert->flag |= ME_VERT_PBVH_UPDATE;
01225             }
01226         }
01227         BLI_pbvh_vertex_iter_end;
01228     }
01229 }
01230 
01231 static void do_pinch_brush(Sculpt *sd, Object *ob, PBVHNode **nodes, int totnode)
01232 {
01233     SculptSession *ss = ob->sculpt;
01234     Brush *brush = paint_brush(&sd->paint);
01235     float bstrength = ss->cache->bstrength;
01236     int n;
01237 
01238     #pragma omp parallel for schedule(guided) if (sd->flags & SCULPT_USE_OPENMP)
01239     for (n = 0; n < totnode; n++) {
01240         PBVHVertexIter vd;
01241         SculptBrushTest test;
01242         float (*proxy)[3];
01243 
01244         proxy = BLI_pbvh_node_add_proxy(ss->pbvh, nodes[n])->co;
01245 
01246         sculpt_brush_test_init(ss, &test);
01247 
01248         BLI_pbvh_vertex_iter_begin(ss->pbvh, nodes[n], vd, PBVH_ITER_UNIQUE) {
01249             if (sculpt_brush_test(&test, vd.co)) {
01250                 float fade = bstrength * tex_strength(ss, brush, vd.co, test.dist,
01251                                                       ss->cache->view_normal, vd.no, vd.fno);
01252                 float val[3];
01253 
01254                 sub_v3_v3v3(val, test.location, vd.co);
01255                 mul_v3_v3fl(proxy[vd.i], val, fade);
01256 
01257                 if (vd.mvert)
01258                     vd.mvert->flag |= ME_VERT_PBVH_UPDATE;
01259             }
01260         }
01261         BLI_pbvh_vertex_iter_end;
01262     }
01263 }
01264 
01265 static void do_grab_brush(Sculpt *sd, Object *ob, PBVHNode **nodes, int totnode)
01266 {
01267     SculptSession *ss = ob->sculpt;
01268     Brush *brush = paint_brush(&sd->paint);
01269     float bstrength = ss->cache->bstrength;
01270     float grab_delta[3], an[3];
01271     int n;
01272     float len;
01273 
01274     if (brush->normal_weight > 0 || brush->flag & BRUSH_FRONTFACE) {
01275         int cache = 1;
01276         /* grab brush requires to test on original data */
01277         SWAP(int, ss->cache->original, cache);
01278         calc_sculpt_normal(sd, ob, an, nodes, totnode);
01279         SWAP(int, ss->cache->original, cache);
01280     }
01281     
01282     copy_v3_v3(grab_delta, ss->cache->grab_delta_symmetry);
01283 
01284     len = len_v3(grab_delta);
01285 
01286     if (brush->normal_weight > 0) {
01287         mul_v3_fl(an, len * brush->normal_weight);
01288         mul_v3_fl(grab_delta, 1.0f - brush->normal_weight);
01289         add_v3_v3(grab_delta, an);
01290     }
01291 
01292     #pragma omp parallel for schedule(guided) if (sd->flags & SCULPT_USE_OPENMP)
01293     for (n = 0; n < totnode; n++) {
01294         PBVHVertexIter vd;
01295         SculptUndoNode *unode;
01296         SculptBrushTest test;
01297         float (*origco)[3];
01298         short (*origno)[3];
01299         float (*proxy)[3];
01300 
01301         unode =  sculpt_undo_push_node(ob, nodes[n], SCULPT_UNDO_COORDS);
01302         origco = unode->co;
01303         origno = unode->no;
01304 
01305         proxy = BLI_pbvh_node_add_proxy(ss->pbvh, nodes[n])->co;
01306 
01307         sculpt_brush_test_init(ss, &test);
01308 
01309         BLI_pbvh_vertex_iter_begin(ss->pbvh, nodes[n], vd, PBVH_ITER_UNIQUE)
01310         {
01311             if (sculpt_brush_test(&test, origco[vd.i])) {
01312                 const float fade = bstrength * tex_strength(ss, brush, origco[vd.i], test.dist,
01313                                                             an, origno[vd.i], NULL);
01314 
01315                 mul_v3_v3fl(proxy[vd.i], grab_delta, fade);
01316 
01317                 if (vd.mvert)
01318                     vd.mvert->flag |= ME_VERT_PBVH_UPDATE;
01319             }
01320         }
01321         BLI_pbvh_vertex_iter_end;
01322     }
01323 }
01324 
01325 static void do_nudge_brush(Sculpt *sd, Object *ob, PBVHNode **nodes, int totnode)
01326 {
01327     SculptSession *ss = ob->sculpt;
01328     Brush *brush = paint_brush(&sd->paint);
01329     float bstrength = ss->cache->bstrength;
01330     float grab_delta[3];
01331     int n;
01332     float an[3];
01333     float tmp[3], cono[3];
01334 
01335     copy_v3_v3(grab_delta, ss->cache->grab_delta_symmetry);
01336 
01337     calc_sculpt_normal(sd, ob, an, nodes, totnode);
01338 
01339     cross_v3_v3v3(tmp, an, grab_delta);
01340     cross_v3_v3v3(cono, tmp, an);
01341 
01342     #pragma omp parallel for schedule(guided) if (sd->flags & SCULPT_USE_OPENMP)
01343     for (n = 0; n < totnode; n++) {
01344         PBVHVertexIter vd;
01345         SculptBrushTest test;
01346         float (*proxy)[3];
01347 
01348         proxy = BLI_pbvh_node_add_proxy(ss->pbvh, nodes[n])->co;
01349 
01350         sculpt_brush_test_init(ss, &test);
01351 
01352         BLI_pbvh_vertex_iter_begin(ss->pbvh, nodes[n], vd, PBVH_ITER_UNIQUE) {
01353             if (sculpt_brush_test(&test, vd.co)) {
01354                 const float fade = bstrength * tex_strength(ss, brush, vd.co, test.dist,
01355                                                             an, vd.no, vd.fno);
01356 
01357                 mul_v3_v3fl(proxy[vd.i], cono, fade);
01358 
01359                 if (vd.mvert)
01360                     vd.mvert->flag |= ME_VERT_PBVH_UPDATE;
01361             }
01362         }
01363         BLI_pbvh_vertex_iter_end;
01364     }
01365 }
01366 
01367 static void do_snake_hook_brush(Sculpt *sd, Object *ob, PBVHNode **nodes, int totnode)
01368 {
01369     SculptSession *ss = ob->sculpt;
01370     Brush *brush = paint_brush(&sd->paint);
01371     float bstrength = ss->cache->bstrength;
01372     float grab_delta[3], an[3];
01373     int n;
01374     float len;
01375 
01376     if (brush->normal_weight > 0 || brush->flag & BRUSH_FRONTFACE)
01377         calc_sculpt_normal(sd, ob, an, nodes, totnode);
01378 
01379     copy_v3_v3(grab_delta, ss->cache->grab_delta_symmetry);
01380 
01381     len = len_v3(grab_delta);
01382 
01383     if (bstrength < 0)
01384         negate_v3(grab_delta);
01385 
01386     if (brush->normal_weight > 0) {
01387         mul_v3_fl(an, len * brush->normal_weight);
01388         mul_v3_fl(grab_delta, 1.0f - brush->normal_weight);
01389         add_v3_v3(grab_delta, an);
01390     }
01391 
01392     #pragma omp parallel for schedule(guided) if (sd->flags & SCULPT_USE_OPENMP)
01393     for (n = 0; n < totnode; n++) {
01394         PBVHVertexIter vd;
01395         SculptBrushTest test;
01396         float (*proxy)[3];
01397 
01398         proxy = BLI_pbvh_node_add_proxy(ss->pbvh, nodes[n])->co;
01399 
01400         sculpt_brush_test_init(ss, &test);
01401 
01402         BLI_pbvh_vertex_iter_begin(ss->pbvh, nodes[n], vd, PBVH_ITER_UNIQUE) {
01403             if (sculpt_brush_test(&test, vd.co)) {
01404                 const float fade = bstrength * tex_strength(ss, brush, vd.co, test.dist,
01405                                                             an, vd.no, vd.fno);
01406 
01407                 mul_v3_v3fl(proxy[vd.i], grab_delta, fade);
01408 
01409                 if (vd.mvert)
01410                     vd.mvert->flag |= ME_VERT_PBVH_UPDATE;
01411             }
01412         }
01413         BLI_pbvh_vertex_iter_end;
01414     }
01415 }
01416 
01417 static void do_thumb_brush(Sculpt *sd, Object *ob, PBVHNode **nodes, int totnode)
01418 {
01419     SculptSession *ss = ob->sculpt;
01420     Brush *brush = paint_brush(&sd->paint);
01421     float bstrength = ss->cache->bstrength;
01422     float grab_delta[3];
01423     int n;
01424     float an[3];
01425     float tmp[3], cono[3];
01426 
01427     copy_v3_v3(grab_delta, ss->cache->grab_delta_symmetry);
01428 
01429     calc_sculpt_normal(sd, ob, an, nodes, totnode);
01430 
01431     cross_v3_v3v3(tmp, an, grab_delta);
01432     cross_v3_v3v3(cono, tmp, an);
01433 
01434     #pragma omp parallel for schedule(guided) if (sd->flags & SCULPT_USE_OPENMP)
01435     for (n = 0; n < totnode; n++) {
01436         PBVHVertexIter vd;
01437         SculptUndoNode *unode;
01438         SculptBrushTest test;
01439         float (*origco)[3];
01440         short (*origno)[3];
01441         float (*proxy)[3];
01442 
01443         unode =  sculpt_undo_push_node(ob, nodes[n], SCULPT_UNDO_COORDS);
01444         origco = unode->co;
01445         origno = unode->no;
01446 
01447         proxy = BLI_pbvh_node_add_proxy(ss->pbvh, nodes[n])->co;
01448 
01449         sculpt_brush_test_init(ss, &test);
01450 
01451         BLI_pbvh_vertex_iter_begin(ss->pbvh, nodes[n], vd, PBVH_ITER_UNIQUE) {
01452             if (sculpt_brush_test(&test, origco[vd.i])) {
01453                 const float fade = bstrength * tex_strength(ss, brush, origco[vd.i], test.dist,
01454                                                             an, origno[vd.i], NULL);
01455 
01456                 mul_v3_v3fl(proxy[vd.i], cono, fade);
01457 
01458                 if (vd.mvert)
01459                     vd.mvert->flag |= ME_VERT_PBVH_UPDATE;
01460             }
01461         }
01462         BLI_pbvh_vertex_iter_end;
01463     }
01464 }
01465 
01466 static void do_rotate_brush(Sculpt *sd, Object *ob, PBVHNode **nodes, int totnode)
01467 {
01468     SculptSession *ss = ob->sculpt;
01469     Brush *brush = paint_brush(&sd->paint);
01470     float bstrength = ss->cache->bstrength;
01471     float an[3];
01472     int n;
01473     float m[4][4], rot[4][4], lmat[4][4], ilmat[4][4];
01474     static const int flip[8] = { 1, -1, -1, 1, -1, 1, 1, -1 };
01475     float angle = ss->cache->vertex_rotation * flip[ss->cache->mirror_symmetry_pass];
01476 
01477     calc_sculpt_normal(sd, ob, an, nodes, totnode);
01478 
01479     unit_m4(m);
01480     unit_m4(lmat);
01481 
01482     copy_v3_v3(lmat[3], ss->cache->location);
01483     invert_m4_m4(ilmat, lmat);
01484     axis_angle_to_mat4(rot, an, angle);
01485 
01486     mul_serie_m4(m, lmat, rot, ilmat, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL);
01487 
01488     #pragma omp parallel for schedule(guided) if (sd->flags & SCULPT_USE_OPENMP)
01489     for (n = 0; n < totnode; n++) {
01490         PBVHVertexIter vd;
01491         SculptUndoNode *unode;
01492         SculptBrushTest test;
01493         float (*origco)[3];
01494         short (*origno)[3];
01495         float (*proxy)[3];
01496 
01497         unode =  sculpt_undo_push_node(ob, nodes[n], SCULPT_UNDO_COORDS);
01498         origco = unode->co;
01499         origno = unode->no;
01500 
01501         proxy = BLI_pbvh_node_add_proxy(ss->pbvh, nodes[n])->co;
01502 
01503         sculpt_brush_test_init(ss, &test);
01504 
01505         BLI_pbvh_vertex_iter_begin(ss->pbvh, nodes[n], vd, PBVH_ITER_UNIQUE) {
01506             if (sculpt_brush_test(&test, origco[vd.i])) {
01507                 const float fade = bstrength * tex_strength(ss, brush, origco[vd.i], test.dist,
01508                                                             an, origno[vd.i], NULL);
01509 
01510                 mul_v3_m4v3(proxy[vd.i], m, origco[vd.i]);
01511                 sub_v3_v3(proxy[vd.i], origco[vd.i]);
01512                 mul_v3_fl(proxy[vd.i], fade);
01513 
01514                 if (vd.mvert)
01515                     vd.mvert->flag |= ME_VERT_PBVH_UPDATE;
01516             }
01517         }
01518         BLI_pbvh_vertex_iter_end;
01519     }
01520 }
01521 
01522 static void do_layer_brush(Sculpt *sd, Object *ob, PBVHNode **nodes, int totnode)
01523 {
01524     SculptSession *ss = ob->sculpt;
01525     Brush *brush = paint_brush(&sd->paint);
01526     float bstrength = ss->cache->bstrength;
01527     float area_normal[3], offset[3];
01528     float lim = brush->height;
01529     int n;
01530 
01531     if (bstrength < 0)
01532         lim = -lim;
01533 
01534     calc_sculpt_normal(sd, ob, area_normal, nodes, totnode);
01535 
01536     mul_v3_v3v3(offset, ss->cache->scale, area_normal);
01537 
01538     #pragma omp parallel for schedule(guided) if (sd->flags & SCULPT_USE_OPENMP)
01539     for (n = 0; n < totnode; n++) {
01540         PBVHVertexIter vd;
01541         SculptBrushTest test;
01542         SculptUndoNode *unode;
01543         float (*origco)[3], *layer_disp;
01544         /* XXX: layer brush needs conversion to proxy but its more complicated */
01545         /* proxy= BLI_pbvh_node_add_proxy(ss->pbvh, nodes[n])->co; */
01546         
01547         unode = sculpt_undo_push_node(ob, nodes[n], SCULPT_UNDO_COORDS);
01548         origco = unode->co;
01549         if (!unode->layer_disp) {
01550             #pragma omp critical 
01551             unode->layer_disp = MEM_callocN(sizeof(float) * unode->totvert, "layer disp");
01552         }
01553 
01554         layer_disp = unode->layer_disp;
01555 
01556         sculpt_brush_test_init(ss, &test);
01557 
01558         BLI_pbvh_vertex_iter_begin(ss->pbvh, nodes[n], vd, PBVH_ITER_UNIQUE) {
01559             if (sculpt_brush_test(&test, origco[vd.i])) {
01560                 const float fade = bstrength * tex_strength(ss, brush, vd.co, test.dist,
01561                                                             area_normal, vd.no, vd.fno);
01562                 float *disp = &layer_disp[vd.i];
01563                 float val[3];
01564 
01565                 *disp += fade;
01566 
01567                 /* Don't let the displacement go past the limit */
01568                 if ((lim < 0 && *disp < lim) || (lim >= 0 && *disp > lim))
01569                     *disp = lim;
01570 
01571                 mul_v3_v3fl(val, offset, *disp);
01572 
01573                 if (ss->layer_co && (brush->flag & BRUSH_PERSISTENT)) {
01574                     int index = vd.vert_indices[vd.i];
01575 
01576                     /* persistent base */
01577                     add_v3_v3(val, ss->layer_co[index]);
01578                 }
01579                 else {
01580                     add_v3_v3(val, origco[vd.i]);
01581                 }
01582 
01583                 sculpt_clip(sd, ss, vd.co, val);
01584 
01585                 if (vd.mvert)
01586                     vd.mvert->flag |= ME_VERT_PBVH_UPDATE;
01587             }
01588         }
01589         BLI_pbvh_vertex_iter_end;
01590     }
01591 }
01592 
01593 static void do_inflate_brush(Sculpt *sd, Object *ob, PBVHNode **nodes, int totnode)
01594 {
01595     SculptSession *ss = ob->sculpt;
01596     Brush *brush = paint_brush(&sd->paint);
01597     float bstrength = ss->cache->bstrength;
01598     int n;
01599 
01600     #pragma omp parallel for schedule(guided) if (sd->flags & SCULPT_USE_OPENMP)
01601     for (n = 0; n < totnode; n++) {
01602         PBVHVertexIter vd;
01603         SculptBrushTest test;
01604         float (*proxy)[3];
01605 
01606         proxy = BLI_pbvh_node_add_proxy(ss->pbvh, nodes[n])->co;
01607 
01608         sculpt_brush_test_init(ss, &test);
01609 
01610         BLI_pbvh_vertex_iter_begin(ss->pbvh, nodes[n], vd, PBVH_ITER_UNIQUE) {
01611             if (sculpt_brush_test(&test, vd.co)) {
01612                 const float fade = bstrength * tex_strength(ss, brush, vd.co, test.dist,
01613                                                             ss->cache->view_normal, vd.no, vd.fno);
01614                 float val[3];
01615 
01616                 if (vd.fno) copy_v3_v3(val, vd.fno);
01617                 else normal_short_to_float_v3(val, vd.no);
01618                 
01619                 mul_v3_fl(val, fade * ss->cache->radius);
01620                 mul_v3_v3v3(proxy[vd.i], val, ss->cache->scale);
01621 
01622                 if (vd.mvert)
01623                     vd.mvert->flag |= ME_VERT_PBVH_UPDATE;
01624             }
01625         }
01626         BLI_pbvh_vertex_iter_end;
01627     }
01628 }
01629 
01630 static void calc_flatten_center(Sculpt *sd, Object *ob, PBVHNode **nodes, int totnode, float fc[3])
01631 {
01632     SculptSession *ss = ob->sculpt;
01633     int n;
01634 
01635     float count = 0;
01636 
01637     (void)sd; /* unused w/o openmp */
01638 
01639     zero_v3(fc);
01640 
01641     #pragma omp parallel for schedule(guided) if (sd->flags & SCULPT_USE_OPENMP)
01642     for (n = 0; n < totnode; n++) {
01643         PBVHVertexIter vd;
01644         SculptBrushTest test;
01645         SculptUndoNode *unode;
01646         float private_fc[3] = {0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f};
01647         int private_count = 0;
01648 
01649         unode = sculpt_undo_push_node(ob, nodes[n], SCULPT_UNDO_COORDS);
01650         sculpt_brush_test_init(ss, &test);
01651 
01652         if (ss->cache->original) {
01653             BLI_pbvh_vertex_iter_begin(ss->pbvh, nodes[n], vd, PBVH_ITER_UNIQUE) {
01654                 if (sculpt_brush_test_fast(&test, unode->co[vd.i])) {
01655                     add_v3_v3(private_fc, unode->co[vd.i]);
01656                     private_count++;
01657                 }
01658             }
01659             BLI_pbvh_vertex_iter_end;
01660         }
01661         else {
01662             BLI_pbvh_vertex_iter_begin(ss->pbvh, nodes[n], vd, PBVH_ITER_UNIQUE) {
01663                 if (sculpt_brush_test_fast(&test, vd.co)) {
01664                     add_v3_v3(private_fc, vd.co);
01665                     private_count++;
01666                 }
01667             }
01668             BLI_pbvh_vertex_iter_end;
01669         }
01670 
01671         #pragma omp critical
01672         {
01673             add_v3_v3(fc, private_fc);
01674             count += private_count;
01675         }
01676     }
01677 
01678     mul_v3_fl(fc, 1.0f / count);
01679 }
01680 
01681 /* this calculates flatten center and area normal together, 
01682  * amortizing the memory bandwidth and loop overhead to calculate both at the same time */
01683 static void calc_area_normal_and_flatten_center(Sculpt *sd, Object *ob,
01684                                                 PBVHNode **nodes, int totnode,
01685                                                 float an[3], float fc[3])
01686 {
01687     SculptSession *ss = ob->sculpt;
01688     int n;
01689 
01690     /* for area normal */
01691     float out_flip[3] = {0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f};
01692 
01693     /* for flatten center */
01694     float count = 0;
01695 
01696     (void)sd; /* unused w/o openmp */
01697     
01698     /* for area normal */
01699     zero_v3(an);
01700 
01701     /* for flatten center */
01702     zero_v3(fc);
01703 
01704     #pragma omp parallel for schedule(guided) if (sd->flags & SCULPT_USE_OPENMP)
01705     for (n = 0; n < totnode; n++) {
01706         PBVHVertexIter vd;
01707         SculptBrushTest test;
01708         SculptUndoNode *unode;
01709         float private_an[3] = {0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f};
01710         float private_out_flip[3] = {0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f};
01711         float private_fc[3] = {0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f};
01712         int private_count = 0;
01713 
01714         unode = sculpt_undo_push_node(ob, nodes[n], SCULPT_UNDO_COORDS);
01715         sculpt_brush_test_init(ss, &test);
01716 
01717         if (ss->cache->original) {
01718             BLI_pbvh_vertex_iter_begin(ss->pbvh, nodes[n], vd, PBVH_ITER_UNIQUE) {
01719                 if (sculpt_brush_test_fast(&test, unode->co[vd.i])) {
01720                     /* for area normal */
01721                     float fno[3];
01722 
01723                     normal_short_to_float_v3(fno, unode->no[vd.i]);
01724                     add_norm_if(ss->cache->view_normal, private_an, private_out_flip, fno);
01725 
01726                     /* for flatten center */
01727                     add_v3_v3(private_fc, unode->co[vd.i]);
01728                     private_count++;
01729                 }
01730             }
01731             BLI_pbvh_vertex_iter_end;
01732         }
01733         else {
01734             BLI_pbvh_vertex_iter_begin(ss->pbvh, nodes[n], vd, PBVH_ITER_UNIQUE) {
01735                 if (sculpt_brush_test_fast(&test, vd.co)) {
01736                     /* for area normal */
01737                     if (vd.no) {
01738                         float fno[3];
01739 
01740                         normal_short_to_float_v3(fno, vd.no);
01741                         add_norm_if(ss->cache->view_normal, private_an, private_out_flip, fno);
01742                     }
01743                     else {
01744                         add_norm_if(ss->cache->view_normal, private_an, private_out_flip, vd.fno);
01745                     }
01746 
01747                     /* for flatten center */
01748                     add_v3_v3(private_fc, vd.co);
01749                     private_count++;
01750                 }
01751             }
01752             BLI_pbvh_vertex_iter_end;
01753         }
01754 
01755         #pragma omp critical
01756         {
01757             /* for area normal */
01758             add_v3_v3(an, private_an);
01759             add_v3_v3(out_flip, private_out_flip);
01760 
01761             /* for flatten center */
01762             add_v3_v3(fc, private_fc);
01763             count += private_count;
01764         }
01765     }
01766 
01767     /* for area normal */
01768     if (is_zero_v3(an))
01769         copy_v3_v3(an, out_flip);
01770 
01771     normalize_v3(an);
01772 
01773     /* for flatten center */
01774     if (count != 0) {
01775         mul_v3_fl(fc, 1.0f / count);
01776     }
01777     else {
01778         zero_v3(fc);
01779     }
01780 }
01781 
01782 static void calc_sculpt_plane(Sculpt *sd, Object *ob, PBVHNode **nodes, int totnode, float an[3], float fc[3])
01783 {
01784     SculptSession *ss = ob->sculpt;
01785     Brush *brush = paint_brush(&sd->paint);
01786 
01787     if (ss->cache->mirror_symmetry_pass == 0 &&
01788         ss->cache->radial_symmetry_pass == 0 &&
01789         (ss->cache->first_time || !(brush->flag & BRUSH_ORIGINAL_NORMAL)))
01790     {
01791         switch (brush->sculpt_plane) {
01792             case SCULPT_DISP_DIR_VIEW:
01793                 ED_view3d_global_to_vector(ss->cache->vc->rv3d, ss->cache->vc->rv3d->twmat[3], an);
01794                 break;
01795 
01796             case SCULPT_DISP_DIR_X:
01797                 an[1] = 0.0;
01798                 an[2] = 0.0;
01799                 an[0] = 1.0;
01800                 break;
01801 
01802             case SCULPT_DISP_DIR_Y:
01803                 an[0] = 0.0;
01804                 an[2] = 0.0;
01805                 an[1] = 1.0;
01806                 break;
01807 
01808             case SCULPT_DISP_DIR_Z:
01809                 an[0] = 0.0;
01810                 an[1] = 0.0;
01811                 an[2] = 1.0;
01812                 break;
01813 
01814             case SCULPT_DISP_DIR_AREA:
01815                 calc_area_normal_and_flatten_center(sd, ob, nodes, totnode, an, fc);
01816 
01817             default:
01818                 break;
01819         }
01820 
01821         /* for flatten center */
01822         /* flatten center has not been calculated yet if we are not using the area normal */
01823         if (brush->sculpt_plane != SCULPT_DISP_DIR_AREA)
01824             calc_flatten_center(sd, ob, nodes, totnode, fc);
01825 
01826         /* for area normal */
01827         copy_v3_v3(ss->cache->last_area_normal, an);
01828 
01829         /* for flatten center */
01830         copy_v3_v3(ss->cache->last_center, fc);
01831     }
01832     else {
01833         /* for area normal */
01834         copy_v3_v3(an, ss->cache->last_area_normal);
01835 
01836         /* for flatten center */
01837         copy_v3_v3(fc, ss->cache->last_center);
01838 
01839         /* for area normal */
01840         flip_coord(an, an, ss->cache->mirror_symmetry_pass);
01841 
01842         /* for flatten center */
01843         flip_coord(fc, fc, ss->cache->mirror_symmetry_pass);
01844 
01845         /* for area normal */
01846         mul_m4_v3(ss->cache->symm_rot_mat, an);
01847 
01848         /* for flatten center */
01849         mul_m4_v3(ss->cache->symm_rot_mat, fc);
01850     }
01851 }
01852 
01853 /* Projects a point onto a plane along the plane's normal */
01854 static void point_plane_project(float intr[3], float co[3], float plane_normal[3], float plane_center[3])
01855 {
01856     sub_v3_v3v3(intr, co, plane_center);
01857     mul_v3_v3fl(intr, plane_normal, dot_v3v3(plane_normal, intr));
01858     sub_v3_v3v3(intr, co, intr);
01859 }
01860 
01861 static int plane_trim(StrokeCache *cache, Brush *brush, float val[3])
01862 {
01863     return !(brush->flag & BRUSH_PLANE_TRIM) || (dot_v3v3(val, val) <= cache->radius_squared * cache->plane_trim_squared);
01864 }
01865 
01866 static int plane_point_side_flip(float co[3], float plane_normal[3], float plane_center[3], int flip)
01867 {
01868     float delta[3];
01869     float d;
01870 
01871     sub_v3_v3v3(delta, co, plane_center);
01872     d = dot_v3v3(plane_normal, delta);
01873 
01874     if (flip) d = -d;
01875 
01876     return d <= 0.0f;
01877 }
01878 
01879 static int plane_point_side(float co[3], float plane_normal[3], float plane_center[3])
01880 {
01881     float delta[3];
01882 
01883     sub_v3_v3v3(delta, co, plane_center);
01884     return dot_v3v3(plane_normal, delta) <= 0.0f;
01885 }
01886 
01887 static float get_offset(Sculpt *sd, SculptSession *ss)
01888 {
01889     Brush *brush = paint_brush(&sd->paint);
01890 
01891     float rv = brush->plane_offset;
01892 
01893     if (brush->flag & BRUSH_OFFSET_PRESSURE) {
01894         rv *= ss->cache->pressure;
01895     }
01896 
01897     return rv;
01898 }
01899 
01900 static void do_flatten_brush(Sculpt *sd, Object *ob, PBVHNode **nodes, int totnode)
01901 {
01902     SculptSession *ss = ob->sculpt;
01903     Brush *brush = paint_brush(&sd->paint);
01904 
01905     float bstrength = ss->cache->bstrength;
01906     const float radius = ss->cache->radius;
01907 
01908     float an[3];
01909     float fc[3];
01910 
01911     float offset = get_offset(sd, ss);
01912 
01913     float displace;
01914 
01915     int n;
01916 
01917     float temp[3];
01918 
01919     calc_sculpt_plane(sd, ob, nodes, totnode, an, fc);
01920 
01921     displace = radius * offset;
01922 
01923     mul_v3_v3v3(temp, an, ss->cache->scale);
01924     mul_v3_fl(temp, displace);
01925     add_v3_v3(fc, temp);
01926 
01927     #pragma omp parallel for schedule(guided) if (sd->flags & SCULPT_USE_OPENMP)
01928     for (n = 0; n < totnode; n++) {
01929         PBVHVertexIter vd;
01930         SculptBrushTest test;
01931         float (*proxy)[3];
01932 
01933         proxy = BLI_pbvh_node_add_proxy(ss->pbvh, nodes[n])->co;
01934 
01935         sculpt_brush_test_init(ss, &test);
01936 
01937         BLI_pbvh_vertex_iter_begin(ss->pbvh, nodes[n], vd, PBVH_ITER_UNIQUE) {
01938             if (sculpt_brush_test_sq(&test, vd.co)) {
01939                 float intr[3];
01940                 float val[3];
01941 
01942                 point_plane_project(intr, vd.co, an, fc);
01943 
01944                 sub_v3_v3v3(val, intr, vd.co);
01945 
01946                 if (plane_trim(ss->cache, brush, val)) {
01947                     const float fade = bstrength * tex_strength(ss, brush, vd.co, sqrt(test.dist),
01948                                                                 an, vd.no, vd.fno);
01949 
01950                     mul_v3_v3fl(proxy[vd.i], val, fade);
01951 
01952                     if (vd.mvert)
01953                         vd.mvert->flag |= ME_VERT_PBVH_UPDATE;
01954                 }
01955             }
01956         }
01957         BLI_pbvh_vertex_iter_end;
01958     }
01959 }
01960 
01961 static void do_clay_brush(Sculpt *sd, Object *ob, PBVHNode **nodes, int totnode)
01962 {
01963     SculptSession *ss = ob->sculpt;
01964     Brush *brush = paint_brush(&sd->paint);
01965 
01966     float bstrength = ss->cache->bstrength;
01967     float radius    = ss->cache->radius;
01968     float offset    = get_offset(sd, ss);
01969     
01970     float displace;
01971 
01972     float an[3];
01973     float fc[3];
01974 
01975     int n;
01976 
01977     float temp[3];
01978 
01979     int flip;
01980 
01981     calc_sculpt_plane(sd, ob, nodes, totnode, an, fc);
01982 
01983     flip = bstrength < 0;
01984 
01985     if (flip) {
01986         bstrength = -bstrength;
01987         radius    = -radius;
01988     }
01989 
01990     displace = radius * (0.25f + offset);
01991 
01992     mul_v3_v3v3(temp, an, ss->cache->scale);
01993     mul_v3_fl(temp, displace);
01994     add_v3_v3(fc, temp);
01995 
01996     /* add_v3_v3v3(p, ss->cache->location, an); */
01997 
01998     #pragma omp parallel for schedule(guided) if (sd->flags & SCULPT_USE_OPENMP)
01999     for (n = 0; n < totnode; n++) {
02000         PBVHVertexIter vd;
02001         SculptBrushTest test;
02002         float (*proxy)[3];
02003 
02004         proxy = BLI_pbvh_node_add_proxy(ss->pbvh, nodes[n])->co;
02005 
02006         sculpt_brush_test_init(ss, &test);
02007 
02008         BLI_pbvh_vertex_iter_begin(ss->pbvh, nodes[n], vd, PBVH_ITER_UNIQUE) {
02009             if (sculpt_brush_test_sq(&test, vd.co)) {
02010                 if (plane_point_side_flip(vd.co, an, fc, flip)) {
02011                     float intr[3];
02012                     float val[3];
02013 
02014                     point_plane_project(intr, vd.co, an, fc);
02015 
02016                     sub_v3_v3v3(val, intr, vd.co);
02017 
02018                     if (plane_trim(ss->cache, brush, val)) {
02019                         const float fade = bstrength * tex_strength(ss, brush, vd.co,
02020                                                                     sqrt(test.dist),
02021                                                                     an, vd.no, vd.fno);
02022 
02023                         mul_v3_v3fl(proxy[vd.i], val, fade);
02024 
02025                         if (vd.mvert)
02026                             vd.mvert->flag |= ME_VERT_PBVH_UPDATE;
02027                     }
02028                 }
02029             }
02030         }
02031         BLI_pbvh_vertex_iter_end;
02032     }
02033 }
02034 
02035 static void do_clay_strips_brush(Sculpt *sd, Object *ob, PBVHNode **nodes, int totnode)
02036 {
02037     SculptSession *ss = ob->sculpt;
02038     Brush *brush = paint_brush(&sd->paint);
02039 
02040     float bstrength = ss->cache->bstrength;
02041     float radius    = ss->cache->radius;
02042     float offset    = get_offset(sd, ss);
02043     
02044     float displace;
02045 
02046     float sn[3];
02047     float an[3];
02048     float fc[3];
02049 
02050     int n;
02051 
02052     float temp[3];
02053     float mat[4][4];
02054     float scale[4][4];
02055     float tmat[4][4];
02056 
02057     int flip;
02058 
02059     calc_sculpt_plane(sd, ob, nodes, totnode, sn, fc);
02060 
02061     if (brush->sculpt_plane != SCULPT_DISP_DIR_AREA || (brush->flag & BRUSH_ORIGINAL_NORMAL))
02062         calc_area_normal(sd, ob, an, nodes, totnode);
02063     else
02064         copy_v3_v3(an, sn);
02065 
02066     /* delay the first daub because grab delta is not setup */
02067     if (ss->cache->first_time)
02068         return;
02069 
02070     flip = bstrength < 0;
02071 
02072     if (flip) {
02073         bstrength = -bstrength;
02074         radius    = -radius;
02075     }
02076 
02077     displace = radius * (0.25f + offset);
02078 
02079     mul_v3_v3v3(temp, sn, ss->cache->scale);
02080     mul_v3_fl(temp, displace);
02081     add_v3_v3(fc, temp);
02082 
02083     /* init mat */
02084     cross_v3_v3v3(mat[0], an, ss->cache->grab_delta_symmetry);
02085     mat[0][3] = 0;
02086     cross_v3_v3v3(mat[1], an, mat[0]);
02087     mat[1][3] = 0;
02088     copy_v3_v3(mat[2], an);
02089     mat[2][3] = 0;
02090     copy_v3_v3(mat[3], ss->cache->location);
02091     mat[3][3] = 1;
02092     normalize_m4(mat);
02093 
02094     /* scale mat */
02095     scale_m4_fl(scale, ss->cache->radius);
02096     mult_m4_m4m4(tmat, mat, scale);
02097     invert_m4_m4(mat, tmat);
02098 
02099     #pragma omp parallel for schedule(guided) if (sd->flags & SCULPT_USE_OPENMP)
02100     for (n = 0; n < totnode; n++) {
02101         PBVHVertexIter vd;
02102         SculptBrushTest test;
02103         float (*proxy)[3];
02104 
02105         proxy = BLI_pbvh_node_add_proxy(ss->pbvh, nodes[n])->co;
02106 
02107         sculpt_brush_test_init(ss, &test);
02108 
02109         BLI_pbvh_vertex_iter_begin(ss->pbvh, nodes[n], vd, PBVH_ITER_UNIQUE) {
02110             if (sculpt_brush_test_cube(&test, vd.co, mat)) {
02111                 if (plane_point_side_flip(vd.co, sn, fc, flip)) {
02112                     float intr[3];
02113                     float val[3];
02114 
02115                     point_plane_project(intr, vd.co, sn, fc);
02116 
02117                     sub_v3_v3v3(val, intr, vd.co);
02118 
02119                     if (plane_trim(ss->cache, brush, val)) {
02120                         const float fade = bstrength * tex_strength(ss, brush, vd.co,
02121                                                                     ss->cache->radius * test.dist,
02122                                                                     an, vd.no, vd.fno);
02123 
02124                         mul_v3_v3fl(proxy[vd.i], val, fade);
02125 
02126                         if (vd.mvert)
02127                             vd.mvert->flag |= ME_VERT_PBVH_UPDATE;
02128                     }
02129                 }
02130             }
02131         }
02132         BLI_pbvh_vertex_iter_end;
02133     }
02134 }
02135 
02136 static void do_fill_brush(Sculpt *sd, Object *ob, PBVHNode **nodes, int totnode)
02137 {
02138     SculptSession *ss = ob->sculpt;
02139     Brush *brush = paint_brush(&sd->paint);
02140 
02141     float bstrength = ss->cache->bstrength;
02142     const float radius = ss->cache->radius;
02143 
02144     float an[3];
02145     float fc[3];
02146     float offset = get_offset(sd, ss);
02147 
02148     float displace;
02149 
02150     int n;
02151 
02152     float temp[3];
02153 
02154     calc_sculpt_plane(sd, ob, nodes, totnode, an, fc);
02155 
02156     displace = radius * offset;
02157 
02158     mul_v3_v3v3(temp, an, ss->cache->scale);
02159     mul_v3_fl(temp, displace);
02160     add_v3_v3(fc, temp);
02161 
02162     #pragma omp parallel for schedule(guided) if (sd->flags & SCULPT_USE_OPENMP)
02163     for (n = 0; n < totnode; n++) {
02164         PBVHVertexIter vd;
02165         SculptBrushTest test;
02166         float (*proxy)[3];
02167 
02168         proxy = BLI_pbvh_node_add_proxy(ss->pbvh, nodes[n])->co;
02169 
02170         sculpt_brush_test_init(ss, &test);
02171 
02172         BLI_pbvh_vertex_iter_begin(ss->pbvh, nodes[n], vd, PBVH_ITER_UNIQUE) {
02173             if (sculpt_brush_test_sq(&test, vd.co)) {
02174                 if (plane_point_side(vd.co, an, fc)) {
02175                     float intr[3];
02176                     float val[3];
02177 
02178                     point_plane_project(intr, vd.co, an, fc);
02179 
02180                     sub_v3_v3v3(val, intr, vd.co);
02181 
02182                     if (plane_trim(ss->cache, brush, val)) {
02183                         const float fade = bstrength * tex_strength(ss, brush, vd.co,
02184                                                                     sqrt(test.dist),
02185                                                                     an, vd.no, vd.fno);
02186 
02187                         mul_v3_v3fl(proxy[vd.i], val, fade);
02188 
02189                         if (vd.mvert)
02190                             vd.mvert->flag |= ME_VERT_PBVH_UPDATE;
02191                     }
02192                 }
02193             }
02194         }
02195         BLI_pbvh_vertex_iter_end;
02196     }
02197 }
02198 
02199 static void do_scrape_brush(Sculpt *sd, Object *ob, PBVHNode **nodes, int totnode)
02200 {
02201     SculptSession *ss = ob->sculpt;
02202     Brush *brush = paint_brush(&sd->paint);
02203 
02204     float bstrength = ss->cache->bstrength;
02205     const float radius = ss->cache->radius;
02206 
02207     float an[3];
02208     float fc[3];
02209     float offset = get_offset(sd, ss);
02210 
02211     float displace;
02212 
02213     int n;
02214 
02215     float temp[3];
02216 
02217     calc_sculpt_plane(sd, ob, nodes, totnode, an, fc);
02218 
02219     displace = -radius * offset;
02220 
02221     mul_v3_v3v3(temp, an, ss->cache->scale);
02222     mul_v3_fl(temp, displace);
02223     add_v3_v3(fc, temp);
02224 
02225     #pragma omp parallel for schedule(guided) if (sd->flags & SCULPT_USE_OPENMP)
02226     for (n = 0; n < totnode; n++) {
02227         PBVHVertexIter vd;
02228         SculptBrushTest test;
02229         float (*proxy)[3];
02230 
02231         proxy = BLI_pbvh_node_add_proxy(ss->pbvh, nodes[n])->co;
02232 
02233         sculpt_brush_test_init(ss, &test);
02234 
02235         BLI_pbvh_vertex_iter_begin(ss->pbvh, nodes[n], vd, PBVH_ITER_UNIQUE) {
02236             if (sculpt_brush_test_sq(&test, vd.co)) {
02237                 if (!plane_point_side(vd.co, an, fc)) {
02238                     float intr[3];
02239                     float val[3];
02240 
02241                     point_plane_project(intr, vd.co, an, fc);
02242 
02243                     sub_v3_v3v3(val, intr, vd.co);
02244 
02245                     if (plane_trim(ss->cache, brush, val)) {
02246                         const float fade = bstrength * tex_strength(ss, brush, vd.co,
02247                                                                     sqrt(test.dist),
02248                                                                     an, vd.no, vd.fno);
02249 
02250                         mul_v3_v3fl(proxy[vd.i], val, fade);
02251 
02252                         if (vd.mvert)
02253                             vd.mvert->flag |= ME_VERT_PBVH_UPDATE;
02254                     }
02255                 }
02256             }
02257         }
02258         BLI_pbvh_vertex_iter_end;
02259     }
02260 }
02261 
02262 void sculpt_vertcos_to_key(Object *ob, KeyBlock *kb, float (*vertCos)[3])
02263 {
02264     Mesh *me = (Mesh *)ob->data;
02265     float (*ofs)[3] = NULL;
02266     int a, is_basis = 0;
02267     KeyBlock *currkey;
02268 
02269     /* for relative keys editing of base should update other keys */
02270     if (me->key->type == KEY_RELATIVE)
02271         for (currkey = me->key->block.first; currkey; currkey = currkey->next)
02272             if (ob->shapenr - 1 == currkey->relative) {
02273                 is_basis = 1;
02274                 break;
02275             }
02276 
02277     if (is_basis) {
02278         ofs = key_to_vertcos(ob, kb);
02279 
02280         /* calculate key coord offsets (from previous location) */
02281         for (a = 0; a < me->totvert; a++) {
02282             sub_v3_v3v3(ofs[a], vertCos[a], ofs[a]);
02283         }
02284 
02285         /* apply offsets on other keys */
02286         currkey = me->key->block.first;
02287         while (currkey) {
02288             int apply_offset = ((currkey != kb) && (ob->shapenr - 1 == currkey->relative));
02289 
02290             if (apply_offset)
02291                 offset_to_key(ob, currkey, ofs);
02292 
02293             currkey = currkey->next;
02294         }
02295 
02296         MEM_freeN(ofs);
02297     }
02298 
02299     /* modifying of basis key should update mesh */
02300     if (kb == me->key->refkey) {
02301         MVert *mvert = me->mvert;
02302 
02303         for (a = 0; a < me->totvert; a++, mvert++)
02304             copy_v3_v3(mvert->co, vertCos[a]);
02305 
02306         mesh_calc_normals_mapping(me->mvert, me->totvert, me->mloop, me->mpoly, me->totloop, me->totpoly, NULL, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL);
02307     }
02308 
02309     /* apply new coords on active key block */
02310     vertcos_to_key(ob, kb, vertCos);
02311 }
02312 
02313 static void do_brush_action(Sculpt *sd, Object *ob, Brush *brush)
02314 {
02315     SculptSession *ss = ob->sculpt;
02316     SculptSearchSphereData data;
02317     PBVHNode **nodes = NULL;
02318     int n, totnode;
02319 
02320     /* Build a list of all nodes that are potentially within the brush's area of influence */
02321     data.ss = ss;
02322     data.sd = sd;
