02323     data.radius_squared = ss->cache->radius_squared;
02324     data.original = ELEM4(brush->sculpt_tool, SCULPT_TOOL_GRAB, SCULPT_TOOL_ROTATE, SCULPT_TOOL_THUMB, SCULPT_TOOL_LAYER);
02325     BLI_pbvh_search_gather(ss->pbvh, sculpt_search_sphere_cb, &data, &nodes, &totnode);
02326 
02327     /* Only act if some verts are inside the brush area */
02328     if (totnode) {
02329         #pragma omp parallel for schedule(guided) if (sd->flags & SCULPT_USE_OPENMP)
02330         for (n = 0; n < totnode; n++) {
02331             sculpt_undo_push_node(ob, nodes[n], SCULPT_UNDO_COORDS);
02332             BLI_pbvh_node_mark_update(nodes[n]);
02333         }
02334 
02335         /* Apply one type of brush action */
02336         switch (brush->sculpt_tool) {
02337             case SCULPT_TOOL_DRAW:
02338                 do_draw_brush(sd, ob, nodes, totnode);
02339                 break;
02340             case SCULPT_TOOL_SMOOTH:
02341                 do_smooth_brush(sd, ob, nodes, totnode);
02342                 break;
02343             case SCULPT_TOOL_CREASE:
02344                 do_crease_brush(sd, ob, nodes, totnode);
02345                 break;
02346             case SCULPT_TOOL_BLOB:
02347                 do_crease_brush(sd, ob, nodes, totnode);
02348                 break;
02349             case SCULPT_TOOL_PINCH:
02350                 do_pinch_brush(sd, ob, nodes, totnode);
02351                 break;
02352             case SCULPT_TOOL_INFLATE:
02353                 do_inflate_brush(sd, ob, nodes, totnode);
02354                 break;
02355             case SCULPT_TOOL_GRAB:
02356                 do_grab_brush(sd, ob, nodes, totnode);
02357                 break;
02358             case SCULPT_TOOL_ROTATE:
02359                 do_rotate_brush(sd, ob, nodes, totnode);
02360                 break;
02361             case SCULPT_TOOL_SNAKE_HOOK:
02362                 do_snake_hook_brush(sd, ob, nodes, totnode);
02363                 break;
02364             case SCULPT_TOOL_NUDGE:
02365                 do_nudge_brush(sd, ob, nodes, totnode);
02366                 break;
02367             case SCULPT_TOOL_THUMB:
02368                 do_thumb_brush(sd, ob, nodes, totnode);
02369                 break;
02370             case SCULPT_TOOL_LAYER:
02371                 do_layer_brush(sd, ob, nodes, totnode);
02372                 break;
02373             case SCULPT_TOOL_FLATTEN:
02374                 do_flatten_brush(sd, ob, nodes, totnode);
02375                 break;
02376             case SCULPT_TOOL_CLAY:
02377                 do_clay_brush(sd, ob, nodes, totnode);
02378                 break;
02379             case SCULPT_TOOL_CLAY_STRIPS:
02380                 do_clay_strips_brush(sd, ob, nodes, totnode);
02381                 break;
02382             case SCULPT_TOOL_FILL:
02383                 do_fill_brush(sd, ob, nodes, totnode);
02384                 break;
02385             case SCULPT_TOOL_SCRAPE:
02386                 do_scrape_brush(sd, ob, nodes, totnode);
02387                 break;
02388         }
02389 
02390         if (brush->sculpt_tool != SCULPT_TOOL_SMOOTH && brush->autosmooth_factor > 0) {
02391             if (brush->flag & BRUSH_INVERSE_SMOOTH_PRESSURE) {
02392                 smooth(sd, ob, nodes, totnode, brush->autosmooth_factor * (1 - ss->cache->pressure));
02393             }
02394             else {
02395                 smooth(sd, ob, nodes, totnode, brush->autosmooth_factor);
02396             }
02397         }
02398 
02399         MEM_freeN(nodes);
02400     }
02401 }
02402 
02403 /* flush displacement from deformed PBVH vertex to original mesh */
02404 static void sculpt_flush_pbvhvert_deform(Object *ob, PBVHVertexIter *vd)
02405 {
02406     SculptSession *ss = ob->sculpt;
02407     Mesh *me = ob->data;
02408     float disp[3], newco[3];
02409     int index = vd->vert_indices[vd->i];
02410 
02411     sub_v3_v3v3(disp, vd->co, ss->deform_cos[index]);
02412     mul_m3_v3(ss->deform_imats[index], disp);
02413     add_v3_v3v3(newco, disp, ss->orig_cos[index]);
02414 
02415     copy_v3_v3(ss->deform_cos[index], vd->co);
02416     copy_v3_v3(ss->orig_cos[index], newco);
02417 
02418     if (!ss->kb)
02419         copy_v3_v3(me->mvert[index].co, newco);
02420 }
02421 
02422 static void sculpt_combine_proxies(Sculpt *sd, Object *ob)
02423 {
02424     SculptSession *ss = ob->sculpt;
02425     Brush *brush = paint_brush(&sd->paint);
02426     PBVHNode **nodes;
02427     int totnode, n;
02428 
02429     BLI_pbvh_gather_proxies(ss->pbvh, &nodes, &totnode);
02430 
02431     if (!ELEM(brush->sculpt_tool, SCULPT_TOOL_SMOOTH, SCULPT_TOOL_LAYER)) {
02432         /* these brushes start from original coordinates */
02433         const int use_orco = (ELEM3(brush->sculpt_tool, SCULPT_TOOL_GRAB,
02434                                     SCULPT_TOOL_ROTATE, SCULPT_TOOL_THUMB));
02435 
02436         #pragma omp parallel for schedule(guided) if (sd->flags & SCULPT_USE_OPENMP)
02437         for (n = 0; n < totnode; n++) {
02438             PBVHVertexIter vd;
02439             PBVHProxyNode *proxies;
02440             int proxy_count;
02441             float (*orco)[3];
02442 
02443             if (use_orco)
02444                 orco = sculpt_undo_push_node(ob, nodes[n], SCULPT_UNDO_COORDS)->co;
02445 
02446             BLI_pbvh_node_get_proxies(nodes[n], &proxies, &proxy_count);
02447 
02448             BLI_pbvh_vertex_iter_begin(ss->pbvh, nodes[n], vd, PBVH_ITER_UNIQUE) {
02449                 float val[3];
02450                 int p;
02451 
02452                 if (use_orco)
02453                     copy_v3_v3(val, orco[vd.i]);
02454                 else
02455                     copy_v3_v3(val, vd.co);
02456 
02457                 for (p = 0; p < proxy_count; p++)
02458                     add_v3_v3(val, proxies[p].co[vd.i]);
02459 
02460                 sculpt_clip(sd, ss, vd.co, val);
02461 
02462                 if (ss->modifiers_active)
02463                     sculpt_flush_pbvhvert_deform(ob, &vd);
02464             }
02465             BLI_pbvh_vertex_iter_end;
02466 
02467             BLI_pbvh_node_free_proxies(nodes[n]);
02468         }
02469     }
02470 
02471     if (nodes)
02472         MEM_freeN(nodes);
02473 }
02474 
02475 /* copy the modified vertices from bvh to the active key */
02476 static void sculpt_update_keyblock(Object *ob)
02477 {
02478     SculptSession *ss = ob->sculpt;
02479     float (*vertCos)[3];
02480 
02481     /* Keyblock update happens after hadning deformation caused by modifiers,
02482      * so ss->orig_cos would be updated with new stroke */
02483     if (ss->orig_cos) vertCos = ss->orig_cos;
02484     else vertCos = BLI_pbvh_get_vertCos(ss->pbvh);
02485 
02486     if (vertCos) {
02487         sculpt_vertcos_to_key(ob, ss->kb, vertCos);
02488 
02489         if (vertCos != ss->orig_cos)
02490             MEM_freeN(vertCos);
02491     }
02492 }
02493 
02494 /* flush displacement from deformed PBVH to original layer */
02495 static void sculpt_flush_stroke_deform(Sculpt *sd, Object *ob)
02496 {
02497     SculptSession *ss = ob->sculpt;
02498     Brush *brush = paint_brush(&sd->paint);
02499 
02500     if (ELEM(brush->sculpt_tool, SCULPT_TOOL_SMOOTH, SCULPT_TOOL_LAYER)) {
02501         /* this brushes aren't using proxies, so sculpt_combine_proxies() wouldn't
02502          * propagate needed deformation to original base */
02503 
02504         int n, totnode;
02505         Mesh *me = (Mesh *)ob->data;
02506         PBVHNode **nodes;
02507         float (*vertCos)[3] = NULL;
02508 
02509         if (ss->kb)
02510             vertCos = MEM_callocN(sizeof(*vertCos) * me->totvert, "flushStrokeDeofrm keyVerts");
02511 
02512         BLI_pbvh_search_gather(ss->pbvh, NULL, NULL, &nodes, &totnode);
02513 
02514         #pragma omp parallel for schedule(guided) if (sd->flags & SCULPT_USE_OPENMP)
02515         for (n = 0; n < totnode; n++) {
02516             PBVHVertexIter vd;
02517 
02518             BLI_pbvh_vertex_iter_begin(ss->pbvh, nodes[n], vd, PBVH_ITER_UNIQUE) {
02519                 sculpt_flush_pbvhvert_deform(ob, &vd);
02520 
02521                 if (vertCos) {
02522                     int index = vd.vert_indices[vd.i];
02523                     copy_v3_v3(vertCos[index], ss->orig_cos[index]);
02524                 }
02525             }
02526             BLI_pbvh_vertex_iter_end;
02527         }
02528 
02529         if (vertCos) {
02530             sculpt_vertcos_to_key(ob, ss->kb, vertCos);
02531             MEM_freeN(vertCos);
02532         }
02533 
02534         MEM_freeN(nodes);
02535 
02536         /* Modifiers could depend on mesh normals, so we should update them/
02537          * Note, then if sculpting happens on locked key, normals should be re-calculated
02538          * after applying coords from keyblock on base mesh */
02539         mesh_calc_normals(me->mvert, me->totvert, me->mloop, me->mpoly, me->totloop, me->totpoly, NULL);
02540     }
02541     else if (ss->kb) {
02542         sculpt_update_keyblock(ob);
02543     }
02544 }
02545 
02546 /* Flip all the editdata across the axis/axes specified by symm. Used to
02547  * calculate multiple modifications to the mesh when symmetry is enabled. */
02548 static void calc_brushdata_symm(Sculpt *sd, StrokeCache *cache, const char symm,
02549                                 const char axis, const float angle,
02550                                 const float UNUSED(feather))
02551 {
02552     (void)sd; /* unused */
02553 
02554     flip_coord(cache->location, cache->true_location, symm);
02555     flip_coord(cache->grab_delta_symmetry, cache->grab_delta, symm);
02556     flip_coord(cache->view_normal, cache->true_view_normal, symm);
02557 
02558     /* XXX This reduces the length of the grab delta if it approaches the line of symmetry
02559      * XXX However, a different approach appears to be needed */
02560 #if 0
02561     if (sd->flags & SCULPT_SYMMETRY_FEATHER) {
02562         float frac = 1.0f/max_overlap_count(sd);
02563         float reduce = (feather-frac)/(1-frac);
02564 
02565         printf("feather: %f frac: %f reduce: %f\n", feather, frac, reduce);
02566 
02567         if (frac < 1)
02568             mul_v3_fl(cache->grab_delta_symmetry, reduce);
02569     }
02570 #endif
02571 
02572     unit_m4(cache->symm_rot_mat);
02573     unit_m4(cache->symm_rot_mat_inv);
02574 
02575     if (axis) { /* expects XYZ */
02576         rotate_m4(cache->symm_rot_mat, axis, angle);
02577         rotate_m4(cache->symm_rot_mat_inv, axis, -angle);
02578     }
02579 
02580     mul_m4_v3(cache->symm_rot_mat, cache->location);
02581     mul_m4_v3(cache->symm_rot_mat, cache->grab_delta_symmetry);
02582 }
02583 
02584 static void do_radial_symmetry(Sculpt *sd, Object *ob, Brush *brush,
02585                                const char symm, const int axis,
02586                                const float feather)
02587 {
02588     SculptSession *ss = ob->sculpt;
02589     int i;
02590 
02591     for (i = 1; i < sd->radial_symm[axis - 'X']; ++i) {
02592         const float angle = 2 * M_PI * i / sd->radial_symm[axis - 'X'];
02593         ss->cache->radial_symmetry_pass = i;
02594         calc_brushdata_symm(sd, ss->cache, symm, axis, angle, feather);
02595         do_brush_action(sd, ob, brush);
02596     }
02597 }
02598 
02599 /* noise texture gives different values for the same input coord; this
02600  * can tear a multires mesh during sculpting so do a stitch in this
02601  * case */
02602 static void sculpt_fix_noise_tear(Sculpt *sd, Object *ob)
02603 {
02604     SculptSession *ss = ob->sculpt;
02605     Brush *brush = paint_brush(&sd->paint);
02606     MTex *mtex = &brush->mtex;
02607 
02608     if (ss->multires && mtex->tex && mtex->tex->type == TEX_NOISE)
02609         multires_stitch_grids(ob);
02610 }
02611 
02612 static void do_symmetrical_brush_actions(Sculpt *sd, Object *ob)
02613 {
02614     Brush *brush = paint_brush(&sd->paint);
02615     SculptSession *ss = ob->sculpt;
02616     StrokeCache *cache = ss->cache;
02617     const char symm = sd->flags & 7;
02618     int i;
02619 
02620     float feather = calc_symmetry_feather(sd, ss->cache);
02621 
02622     cache->bstrength = brush_strength(sd, cache, feather);
02623 
02624     cache->symmetry = symm;
02625 
02626     /* symm is a bit combination of XYZ - 1 is mirror X; 2 is Y; 3 is XY; 4 is Z; 5 is XZ; 6 is YZ; 7 is XYZ */ 
02627     for (i = 0; i <= symm; ++i) {
02628         if (i == 0 || (symm & i && (symm != 5 || i != 3) && (symm != 6 || (i != 3 && i != 5)))) {
02629             cache->mirror_symmetry_pass = i;
02630             cache->radial_symmetry_pass = 0;
02631 
02632             calc_brushdata_symm(sd, cache, i, 0, 0, feather);
02633             do_brush_action(sd, ob, brush);
02634 
02635             do_radial_symmetry(sd, ob, brush, i, 'X', feather);
02636             do_radial_symmetry(sd, ob, brush, i, 'Y', feather);
02637             do_radial_symmetry(sd, ob, brush, i, 'Z', feather);
02638         }
02639     }
02640 
02641     sculpt_combine_proxies(sd, ob);
02642 
02643     /* hack to fix noise texture tearing mesh */
02644     sculpt_fix_noise_tear(sd, ob);
02645 
02646     if (ss->modifiers_active)
02647         sculpt_flush_stroke_deform(sd, ob);
02648 
02649     cache->first_time = 0;
02650 }
02651 
02652 static void sculpt_update_tex(const Scene *scene, Sculpt *sd, SculptSession *ss)
02653 {
02654     Brush *brush = paint_brush(&sd->paint);
02655     const int radius = brush_size(scene, brush);
02656 
02657     if (ss->texcache) {
02658         MEM_freeN(ss->texcache);
02659         ss->texcache = NULL;
02660     }
02661 
02662     /* Need to allocate a bigger buffer for bigger brush size */
02663     ss->texcache_side = 2 * radius;
02664     if (!ss->texcache || ss->texcache_side > ss->texcache_actual) {
02665         ss->texcache = brush_gen_texture_cache(brush, radius);
02666         ss->texcache_actual = ss->texcache_side;
02667     }
02668 }
02669 
02670 void sculpt_update_mesh_elements(Scene *scene, Sculpt *sd, Object *ob, int need_pmap)
02671 {
02672     DerivedMesh *dm = mesh_get_derived_final(scene, ob, CD_MASK_BAREMESH);
02673     SculptSession *ss = ob->sculpt;
02674     MultiresModifierData *mmd = sculpt_multires_active(scene, ob);
02675 
02676     ss->modifiers_active = sculpt_modifiers_active(scene, sd, ob);
02677 
02678     if (!mmd) ss->kb = ob_get_keyblock(ob);
02679     else ss->kb = NULL;
02680 
02681     if (mmd) {
02682         ss->multires = mmd;
02683         ss->totvert = dm->getNumVerts(dm);
02684         ss->totpoly = dm->getNumPolys(dm);
02685         ss->mvert = NULL;
02686         ss->mpoly = NULL;
02687         ss->mloop = NULL;
02688         ss->face_normals = NULL;
02689     }
02690     else {
02691         Mesh *me = get_mesh(ob);
02692         ss->totvert = me->totvert;
02693         ss->totpoly = me->totpoly;
02694         ss->mvert = me->mvert;
02695         ss->mpoly = me->mpoly;
02696         ss->mloop = me->mloop;
02697         ss->face_normals = NULL;
02698         ss->multires = NULL;
02699     }
02700 
02701     /* BMESH ONLY --- at some point we should move sculpt code to use polygons only - but for now it needs tessfaces */
02702     BKE_mesh_tessface_ensure(ob->data);
02703 
02704     ss->pbvh = dm->getPBVH(ob, dm);
02705     ss->pmap = (need_pmap && dm->getPolyMap) ? dm->getPolyMap(ob, dm) : NULL;
02706 
02707     if (ss->modifiers_active) {
02708         if (!ss->orig_cos) {
02709             int a;
02710 
02711             free_sculptsession_deformMats(ss);
02712 
02713             if (ss->kb) ss->orig_cos = key_to_vertcos(ob, ss->kb);
02714             else ss->orig_cos = mesh_getVertexCos(ob->data, NULL);
02715 
02716             crazyspace_build_sculpt(scene, ob, &ss->deform_imats, &ss->deform_cos);
02717             BLI_pbvh_apply_vertCos(ss->pbvh, ss->deform_cos);
02718 
02719             for (a = 0; a < ((Mesh *)ob->data)->totvert; ++a)
02720                 invert_m3(ss->deform_imats[a]);
02721         }
02722     }
02723     else free_sculptsession_deformMats(ss);
02724 
02725     /* if pbvh is deformed, key block is already applied to it */
02726     if (ss->kb && !BLI_pbvh_isDeformed(ss->pbvh)) {
02727         float (*vertCos)[3] = key_to_vertcos(ob, ss->kb);
02728 
02729         if (vertCos) {
02730             /* apply shape keys coordinates to PBVH */
02731             BLI_pbvh_apply_vertCos(ss->pbvh, vertCos);
02732             MEM_freeN(vertCos);
02733         }
02734     }
02735 }
02736 
02737 int sculpt_mode_poll(bContext *C)
02738 {
02739     Object *ob = CTX_data_active_object(C);
02740     return ob && ob->mode & OB_MODE_SCULPT;
02741 }
02742 
02743 int sculpt_poll(bContext *C)
02744 {
02745     return sculpt_mode_poll(C) && paint_poll(C);
02746 }
02747 
02748 static const char *sculpt_tool_name(Sculpt *sd)
02749 {
02750     Brush *brush = paint_brush(&sd->paint);
02751 
02752     switch (brush->sculpt_tool) {
02753         case SCULPT_TOOL_DRAW:
02754             return "Draw Brush"; break;
02755         case SCULPT_TOOL_SMOOTH:
02756             return "Smooth Brush"; break;
02757         case SCULPT_TOOL_CREASE:
02758             return "Crease Brush"; break;
02759         case SCULPT_TOOL_BLOB:
02760             return "Blob Brush"; break;
02761         case SCULPT_TOOL_PINCH:
02762             return "Pinch Brush"; break;
02763         case SCULPT_TOOL_INFLATE:
02764             return "Inflate Brush"; break;
02765         case SCULPT_TOOL_GRAB:
02766             return "Grab Brush"; break;
02767         case SCULPT_TOOL_NUDGE:
02768             return "Nudge Brush"; break;
02769         case SCULPT_TOOL_THUMB:
02770             return "Thumb Brush"; break;
02771         case SCULPT_TOOL_LAYER:
02772             return "Layer Brush"; break;
02773         case SCULPT_TOOL_FLATTEN:
02774             return "Flatten Brush"; break;
02775         case SCULPT_TOOL_CLAY:
02776             return "Clay Brush"; break;
02777         case SCULPT_TOOL_CLAY_STRIPS:
02778             return "Clay Strips Brush"; break;
02779         case SCULPT_TOOL_FILL:
02780             return "Fill Brush"; break;
02781         case SCULPT_TOOL_SCRAPE:
02782             return "Scrape Brush"; break;
02783         default:
02784             return "Sculpting"; break;
02785     }
02786 }
02787 
02792 static void sculpt_cache_free(StrokeCache *cache)
02793 {
02794     if (cache->face_norms)
02795         MEM_freeN(cache->face_norms);
02796     MEM_freeN(cache);
02797 }
02798 
02799 /* Initialize mirror modifier clipping */
02800 static void sculpt_init_mirror_clipping(Object *ob, SculptSession *ss)
02801 {
02802     ModifierData *md;
02803     int i;
02804 
02805     for (md = ob->modifiers.first; md; md = md->next) {
02806         if (md->type == eModifierType_Mirror &&
02807             (md->mode & eModifierMode_Realtime)) {
02808             MirrorModifierData *mmd = (MirrorModifierData *)md;
02809             
02810             if (mmd->flag & MOD_MIR_CLIPPING) {
02811                 /* check each axis for mirroring */
02812                 for (i = 0; i < 3; ++i) {
02813                     if (mmd->flag & (MOD_MIR_AXIS_X << i)) {
02814                         /* enable sculpt clipping */
02815                         ss->cache->flag |= CLIP_X << i;
02816                         
02817                         /* update the clip tolerance */
02818                         if (mmd->tolerance >
02819                             ss->cache->clip_tolerance[i])
02820                             ss->cache->clip_tolerance[i] =
02821                                 mmd->tolerance;
02822                     }
02823                 }
02824             }
02825         }
02826     }
02827 }
02828 
02829 /* Initialize the stroke cache invariants from operator properties */
02830 static void sculpt_update_cache_invariants(bContext *C, Sculpt *sd, SculptSession *ss, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
02831 {
02832     StrokeCache *cache = MEM_callocN(sizeof(StrokeCache), "stroke cache");
02833     Brush *brush = paint_brush(&sd->paint);
02834     ViewContext *vc = paint_stroke_view_context(op->customdata);
02835     Object *ob = CTX_data_active_object(C);
02836     int i;
02837     int mode;
02838 
02839     ss->cache = cache;
02840 
02841     /* Set scaling adjustment */
02842     ss->cache->scale[0] = 1.0f / ob->size[0];
02843     ss->cache->scale[1] = 1.0f / ob->size[1];
02844     ss->cache->scale[2] = 1.0f / ob->size[2];
02845 
02846     ss->cache->plane_trim_squared = brush->plane_trim * brush->plane_trim;
02847 
02848     ss->cache->flag = 0;
02849 
02850     sculpt_init_mirror_clipping(ob, ss);
02851 
02852     /* Initial mouse location */
02853     if (event) {
02854         ss->cache->initial_mouse[0] = event->x;
02855         ss->cache->initial_mouse[1] = event->y;
02856     }
02857     else {
02858         ss->cache->initial_mouse[0] = 0;
02859         ss->cache->initial_mouse[1] = 0;
02860     }
02861 
02862     mode = RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "mode");
02863     cache->invert = mode == BRUSH_STROKE_INVERT;
02864     cache->alt_smooth = mode == BRUSH_STROKE_SMOOTH;
02865 
02866     /* not very nice, but with current events system implementation
02867      * we can't handle brush appearance inversion hotkey separately (sergey) */
02868     if (cache->invert) brush->flag |= BRUSH_INVERTED;
02869     else brush->flag &= ~BRUSH_INVERTED;
02870 
02871     /* Alt-Smooth */
02872     if (ss->cache->alt_smooth) {
02873         Paint *p = &sd->paint;
02874         Brush *br;
02875         
02876         BLI_strncpy(cache->saved_active_brush_name, brush->id.name + 2, sizeof(cache->saved_active_brush_name));
02877 
02878         br = (Brush *)find_id("BR", "Smooth");
02879         if (br) {
02880             paint_brush_set(p, br);
02881             brush = br;
02882         }
02883     }
02884 
02885     copy_v2_v2(cache->mouse, cache->initial_mouse);
02886     copy_v2_v2(cache->tex_mouse, cache->initial_mouse);
02887 
02888     /* Truly temporary data that isn't stored in properties */
02889 
02890     cache->vc = vc;
02891 
02892     cache->brush = brush;
02893 
02894     /* cache projection matrix */
02895     ED_view3d_ob_project_mat_get(cache->vc->rv3d, ob, cache->projection_mat);
02896 
02897     ED_view3d_global_to_vector(cache->vc->rv3d, cache->vc->rv3d->twmat[3], cache->true_view_normal);
02898     /* Initialize layer brush displacements and persistent coords */
02899     if (brush->sculpt_tool == SCULPT_TOOL_LAYER) {
02900         /* not supported yet for multires */
02901         if (!ss->multires && !ss->layer_co && (brush->flag & BRUSH_PERSISTENT)) {
02902             if (!ss->layer_co)
02903                 ss->layer_co = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(float) * 3 * ss->totvert,
02904                                            "sculpt mesh vertices copy");
02905 
02906             if (ss->deform_cos) memcpy(ss->layer_co, ss->deform_cos, ss->totvert);
02907             else {
02908                 for (i = 0; i < ss->totvert; ++i) {
02909                     copy_v3_v3(ss->layer_co[i], ss->mvert[i].co);
02910                 }
02911             }
02912         }
02913     }
02914 
02915     /* Make copies of the mesh vertex locations and normals for some tools */
02916     if (brush->flag & BRUSH_ANCHORED) {
02917         if (ss->face_normals) {
02918             float *fn = ss->face_normals;
02919             cache->face_norms = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(float) * 3 * ss->totpoly, "Sculpt face norms");
02920             for (i = 0; i < ss->totpoly; ++i, fn += 3)
02921                 copy_v3_v3(cache->face_norms[i], fn);
02922         }
02923 
02924         cache->original = 1;
02925     }
02926 
02927     if (ELEM8(brush->sculpt_tool,
02928               SCULPT_TOOL_DRAW, SCULPT_TOOL_CREASE, SCULPT_TOOL_BLOB,
02929               SCULPT_TOOL_LAYER, SCULPT_TOOL_INFLATE, SCULPT_TOOL_CLAY,
02930               SCULPT_TOOL_CLAY_STRIPS, SCULPT_TOOL_ROTATE))
02931         if (!(brush->flag & BRUSH_ACCUMULATE))
02932             cache->original = 1;
02933 
02934     cache->special_rotation = (brush->flag & BRUSH_RAKE) ? sd->last_angle : 0;
02935 
02936     cache->first_time = 1;
02937 
02938     cache->vertex_rotation = 0;
02939 }
02940 
02941 static void sculpt_update_brush_delta(Sculpt *sd, Object *ob, Brush *brush)
02942 {
02943     SculptSession *ss = ob->sculpt;
02944     StrokeCache *cache = ss->cache;
02945     float mouse[2] = {
02946         cache->mouse[0] - cache->vc->ar->winrct.xmin,
02947         cache->mouse[1] - cache->vc->ar->winrct.ymin
02948     };
02949     int tool = brush->sculpt_tool;
02950 
02951     if (ELEM5(tool,
02952               SCULPT_TOOL_GRAB, SCULPT_TOOL_NUDGE,
02953               SCULPT_TOOL_CLAY_STRIPS, SCULPT_TOOL_SNAKE_HOOK,
02954               SCULPT_TOOL_THUMB)) {
02955         float grab_location[3], imat[4][4], delta[3], loc[3];
02956 
02957         if (cache->first_time) {
02958             copy_v3_v3(cache->orig_grab_location,
02959                        cache->true_location);
02960         }
02961         else if (tool == SCULPT_TOOL_SNAKE_HOOK)
02962             add_v3_v3(cache->true_location, cache->grab_delta);
02963 
02964         /* compute 3d coordinate at same z from original location + mouse */
02965         mul_v3_m4v3(loc, ob->obmat, cache->orig_grab_location);
02966         initgrabz(cache->vc->rv3d, loc[0], loc[1], loc[2]);
02967 
02968         ED_view3d_win_to_3d(cache->vc->ar, loc, mouse, grab_location);
02969 
02970         /* compute delta to move verts by */
02971         if (!cache->first_time) {
02972             switch (tool) {
02973                 case SCULPT_TOOL_GRAB:
02974                 case SCULPT_TOOL_THUMB:
02975                     sub_v3_v3v3(delta, grab_location, cache->old_grab_location);
02976                     invert_m4_m4(imat, ob->obmat);
02977                     mul_mat3_m4_v3(imat, delta);
02978                     add_v3_v3(cache->grab_delta, delta);
02979                     break;
02980                 case SCULPT_TOOL_CLAY_STRIPS:
02981                 case SCULPT_TOOL_NUDGE:
02982                 case SCULPT_TOOL_SNAKE_HOOK:
02983                     if (brush->flag & BRUSH_ANCHORED) {
02984                         float orig[3];
02985                         mul_v3_m4v3(orig, ob->obmat, cache->orig_grab_location);
02986                         sub_v3_v3v3(cache->grab_delta, grab_location, orig);
02987                     }
02988                     else {
02989                         sub_v3_v3v3(cache->grab_delta, grab_location,
02990                                     cache->old_grab_location);
02991                     }
02992                 
02993                     invert_m4_m4(imat, ob->obmat);
02994                     mul_mat3_m4_v3(imat, cache->grab_delta);
02995                     break;
02996             }
02997         }
02998         else {
02999             zero_v3(cache->grab_delta);
03000         }
03001 
03002         copy_v3_v3(cache->old_grab_location, grab_location);
03003 
03004         if (tool == SCULPT_TOOL_GRAB)
03005             copy_v3_v3(sd->anchored_location, cache->true_location);
03006         else if (tool == SCULPT_TOOL_THUMB)
03007             copy_v3_v3(sd->anchored_location, cache->orig_grab_location);           
03008 
03009         if (ELEM(tool, SCULPT_TOOL_GRAB, SCULPT_TOOL_THUMB)) {
03010             /* location stays the same for finding vertices in brush radius */
03011             copy_v3_v3(cache->true_location, cache->orig_grab_location);
03012 
03013             sd->draw_anchored = 1;
03014             copy_v2_v2(sd->anchored_initial_mouse, cache->initial_mouse);
03015             sd->anchored_size = cache->pixel_radius;
03016         }
03017     }
03018 }
03019 
03020 /* Initialize the stroke cache variants from operator properties */
03021 static void sculpt_update_cache_variants(bContext *C, Sculpt *sd, Object *ob,
03022                                          struct PaintStroke *stroke,
03023                                          PointerRNA *ptr)
03024 {
03025     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
03026     SculptSession *ss = ob->sculpt;
03027     StrokeCache *cache = ss->cache;
03028     Brush *brush = paint_brush(&sd->paint);
03029 
03030     int dx, dy;
03031 
03032     /* RNA_float_get_array(ptr, "location", cache->traced_location); */
03033 
03034     if (cache->first_time ||
03035         !((brush->flag & BRUSH_ANCHORED) ||
03036           (brush->sculpt_tool == SCULPT_TOOL_SNAKE_HOOK) ||
03037           (brush->sculpt_tool == SCULPT_TOOL_ROTATE))
03038         )
03039     {
03040         RNA_float_get_array(ptr, "location", cache->true_location);
03041     }
03042 
03043     cache->pen_flip = RNA_boolean_get(ptr, "pen_flip");
03044     RNA_float_get_array(ptr, "mouse", cache->mouse);
03045 
03046     /* XXX: Use pressure value from first brush step for brushes which don't
03047      *      support strokes (grab, thumb). They depends on initial state and
03048      *      brush coord/pressure/etc.
03049      *      It's more an events design issue, which doesn't split coordinate/pressure/angle
03050      *      changing events. We should avoid this after events system re-design */
03051     if (paint_space_stroke_enabled(brush) || cache->first_time)
03052         cache->pressure = RNA_float_get(ptr, "pressure");
03053 
03054     /* Truly temporary data that isn't stored in properties */
03055 
03056     sd->draw_pressure =  1;
03057     sd->pressure_value = cache->pressure;
03058 
03059     cache->previous_pixel_radius = cache->pixel_radius;
03060     cache->pixel_radius = brush_size(scene, brush);
03061 
03062     if (cache->first_time) {
03063         if (!brush_use_locked_size(scene, brush)) {
03064             cache->initial_radius = paint_calc_object_space_radius(cache->vc, cache->true_location, brush_size(scene, brush));
03065             brush_set_unprojected_radius(scene, brush, cache->initial_radius);
03066         }
03067         else {
03068             cache->initial_radius = brush_unprojected_radius(scene, brush);
03069         }
03070     }
03071 
03072     if (brush_use_size_pressure(scene, brush)) {
03073         cache->pixel_radius *= cache->pressure;
03074         cache->radius = cache->initial_radius * cache->pressure;
03075     }
03076     else
03077         cache->radius = cache->initial_radius;
03078 
03079     cache->radius_squared = cache->radius * cache->radius;
03080 
03081     if (!(brush->flag & BRUSH_ANCHORED ||
03082           ELEM4(brush->sculpt_tool, SCULPT_TOOL_GRAB, SCULPT_TOOL_SNAKE_HOOK,
03083                 SCULPT_TOOL_THUMB, SCULPT_TOOL_ROTATE)))
03084     {
03085         copy_v2_v2(cache->tex_mouse, cache->mouse);
03086 
03087         if ((brush->mtex.brush_map_mode == MTEX_MAP_MODE_FIXED) &&
03088             (brush->flag & BRUSH_RANDOM_ROTATION) &&
03089             !(brush->flag & BRUSH_RAKE))
03090         {
03091             cache->special_rotation = 2.0f * (float)M_PI * BLI_frand();
03092         }
03093     }
03094 
03095     if (brush->flag & BRUSH_ANCHORED) {
03096         int hit = 0;
03097 
03098         dx = cache->mouse[0] - cache->initial_mouse[0];
03099         dy = cache->mouse[1] - cache->initial_mouse[1];
03100 
03101         sd->anchored_size = cache->pixel_radius = sqrt(dx * dx + dy * dy);
03102 
03103         cache->special_rotation = atan2(dx, dy) + M_PI;
03104 
03105         if (brush->flag & BRUSH_EDGE_TO_EDGE) {
03106             float halfway[2];
03107             float out[3];
03108 
03109             halfway[0] = (float)dx * 0.5f + cache->initial_mouse[0];
03110             halfway[1] = (float)dy * 0.5f + cache->initial_mouse[1];
03111 
03112             if (sculpt_stroke_get_location(C, out, halfway)) {
03113                 copy_v3_v3(sd->anchored_location, out);
03114                 copy_v2_v2(sd->anchored_initial_mouse, halfway);
03115                 copy_v2_v2(cache->tex_mouse, halfway);
03116                 copy_v3_v3(cache->true_location, sd->anchored_location);
03117                 sd->anchored_size /= 2.0f;
03118                 cache->pixel_radius  /= 2.0f;
03119                 hit = 1;
03120             }
03121         }
03122 
03123         if (!hit)
03124             copy_v2_v2(sd->anchored_initial_mouse, cache->initial_mouse);
03125 
03126         cache->radius = paint_calc_object_space_radius(paint_stroke_view_context(stroke),
03127                                                        cache->true_location,
03128                                                        cache->pixel_radius);
03129         cache->radius_squared = cache->radius * cache->radius;
03130 
03131         copy_v3_v3(sd->anchored_location, cache->true_location);
03132 
03133         sd->draw_anchored = 1;
03134     }
03135     else if (brush->flag & BRUSH_RAKE) {
03136         const float u = 0.5f;
03137         const float v = 1 - u;
03138         const float r = 20;
03139 
03140         const float dx = cache->last_rake[0] - cache->mouse[0];
03141         const float dy = cache->last_rake[1] - cache->mouse[1];
03142 
03143         if (cache->first_time) {
03144             copy_v2_v2(cache->last_rake, cache->mouse);
03145         }
03146         else if (dx * dx + dy * dy >= r * r) {
03147             cache->special_rotation = atan2(dx, dy);
03148 
03149             cache->last_rake[0] = u * cache->last_rake[0] + v * cache->mouse[0];
03150             cache->last_rake[1] = u * cache->last_rake[1] + v * cache->mouse[1];
03151         }
03152     }
03153 
03154     sculpt_update_brush_delta(sd, ob, brush);
03155 
03156     if (brush->sculpt_tool == SCULPT_TOOL_ROTATE) {
03157         dx = cache->mouse[0] - cache->initial_mouse[0];
03158         dy = cache->mouse[1] - cache->initial_mouse[1];
03159 
03160         cache->vertex_rotation = -atan2f(dx, dy) * cache->bstrength;
03161 
03162         sd->draw_anchored = 1;
03163         copy_v2_v2(sd->anchored_initial_mouse, cache->initial_mouse);
03164         copy_v3_v3(sd->anchored_location, cache->true_location);
03165         sd->anchored_size = cache->pixel_radius;
03166     }
03167 
03168     sd->special_rotation = cache->special_rotation;
03169 }
03170 
03171 static void sculpt_stroke_modifiers_check(bContext *C, Object *ob)
03172 {
03173     SculptSession *ss = ob->sculpt;
03174 
03175     if (ss->modifiers_active) {
03176         Sculpt *sd = CTX_data_tool_settings(C)->sculpt;
03177         Brush *brush = paint_brush(&sd->paint);
03178 
03179         sculpt_update_mesh_elements(CTX_data_scene(C), sd, ob, brush->sculpt_tool == SCULPT_TOOL_SMOOTH);
03180     }
03181 }
03182 
03183 typedef struct {
03184     SculptSession *ss;
03185     float *ray_start, *ray_normal;
03186     int hit;
03187     float dist;
03188     int original;
03189 } SculptRaycastData;
03190 
03191 static void sculpt_raycast_cb(PBVHNode *node, void *data_v, float *tmin)
03192 {
03193     if (BLI_pbvh_node_get_tmin(node) < *tmin) {
03194         SculptRaycastData *srd = data_v;
03195         float (*origco)[3] = NULL;
03196 
03197         if (srd->original && srd->ss->cache) {
03198             /* intersect with coordinates from before we started stroke */
03199             SculptUndoNode *unode = sculpt_undo_get_node(node);
03200             origco = (unode) ? unode->co : NULL;
03201         }
03202 
03203         if (BLI_pbvh_node_raycast(srd->ss->pbvh, node, origco, srd->ray_start, srd->ray_normal, &srd->dist)) {
03204             srd->hit = 1;
03205             *tmin = srd->dist;
03206         }
03207     }
03208 }
03209 
03210 /* Do a raycast in the tree to find the 3d brush location
03211  * (This allows us to ignore the GL depth buffer)
03212  * Returns 0 if the ray doesn't hit the mesh, non-zero otherwise
03213  */
03214 int sculpt_stroke_get_location(bContext *C, float out[3], float mouse[2])
03215 {
03216     ViewContext vc;
03217     Object *ob;
03218     SculptSession *ss;
03219     StrokeCache *cache;
03220     float ray_start[3], ray_end[3], ray_normal[3], dist;
03221     float obimat[4][4];
03222     float mval[2];
03223     SculptRaycastData srd;
03224 
03225     view3d_set_viewcontext(C, &vc);
03226     
03227     ob = vc.obact;
03228     ss = ob->sculpt;
03229     cache = ss->cache;
03230 
03231     sculpt_stroke_modifiers_check(C, ob);
03232 
03233     mval[0] = mouse[0] - vc.ar->winrct.xmin;
03234     mval[1] = mouse[1] - vc.ar->winrct.ymin;
03235 
03236     ED_view3d_win_to_segment_clip(vc.ar, vc.v3d, mval, ray_start, ray_end);
03237 
03238     invert_m4_m4(obimat, ob->obmat);
03239     mul_m4_v3(obimat, ray_start);
03240     mul_m4_v3(obimat, ray_end);
03241 
03242     sub_v3_v3v3(ray_normal, ray_end, ray_start);
03243     dist = normalize_v3(ray_normal);
03244 
03245     srd.ss = vc.obact->sculpt;
03246     srd.ray_start = ray_start;
03247     srd.ray_normal = ray_normal;
03248     srd.dist = dist;
03249     srd.hit = 0;
03250     srd.original = (cache) ? cache->original : 0;
03251     BLI_pbvh_raycast(ss->pbvh, sculpt_raycast_cb, &srd,
03252                      ray_start, ray_normal, srd.original);
03253     
03254     copy_v3_v3(out, ray_normal);
03255     mul_v3_fl(out, srd.dist);
03256     add_v3_v3(out, ray_start);
03257 
03258     return srd.hit;
03259 }
03260 
03261 static void sculpt_brush_init_tex(const Scene *scene, Sculpt *sd, SculptSession *ss)
03262 {
03263     Brush *brush = paint_brush(&sd->paint);
03264     MTex *mtex = &brush->mtex;
03265 
03266     /* init mtex nodes */
03267     if (mtex->tex && mtex->tex->nodetree)
03268         ntreeTexBeginExecTree(mtex->tex->nodetree, 1);  /* has internal flag to detect it only does it once */
03269 
03270     /* TODO: Shouldn't really have to do this at the start of every
03271      * stroke, but sculpt would need some sort of notification when
03272      * changes are made to the texture. */
03273     sculpt_update_tex(scene, sd, ss);
03274 }
03275 
03276 static int sculpt_brush_stroke_init(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
03277 {
03278     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
03279     Object *ob = CTX_data_active_object(C);
03280     Sculpt *sd = CTX_data_tool_settings(C)->sculpt;
03281     SculptSession *ss = CTX_data_active_object(C)->sculpt;
03282     Brush *brush = paint_brush(&sd->paint);
03283     int mode = RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "mode");
03284     int is_smooth = 0;
03285 
03286     view3d_operator_needs_opengl(C);
03287     sculpt_brush_init_tex(scene, sd, ss);
03288 
03289     is_smooth |= mode == BRUSH_STROKE_SMOOTH;
03290     is_smooth |= brush->sculpt_tool == SCULPT_TOOL_SMOOTH;
03291 
03292     sculpt_update_mesh_elements(scene, sd, ob, is_smooth);
03293 
03294     return 1;
03295 }
03296 
03297 static void sculpt_restore_mesh(Sculpt *sd, SculptSession *ss)
03298 {
03299     Brush *brush = paint_brush(&sd->paint);
03300 
03301     /* Restore the mesh before continuing with anchored stroke */
03302     if ((brush->flag & BRUSH_ANCHORED) ||
03303         (brush->sculpt_tool == SCULPT_TOOL_GRAB &&
03304          brush_use_size_pressure(ss->cache->vc->scene, brush)) ||
03305         (brush->flag & BRUSH_RESTORE_MESH))
03306     {
03307         StrokeCache *cache = ss->cache;
03308         int i;
03309 
03310         PBVHNode **nodes;
03311         int n, totnode;
03312 
03313         BLI_pbvh_search_gather(ss->pbvh, NULL, NULL, &nodes, &totnode);
03314 
03315         #pragma omp parallel for schedule(guided) if (sd->flags & SCULPT_USE_OPENMP)
03316         for (n = 0; n < totnode; n++) {
03317             SculptUndoNode *unode;
03318             
03319             unode = sculpt_undo_get_node(nodes[n]);
03320             if (unode) {
03321                 PBVHVertexIter vd;
03322 
03323                 BLI_pbvh_vertex_iter_begin(ss->pbvh, nodes[n], vd, PBVH_ITER_UNIQUE) {
03324                     copy_v3_v3(vd.co, unode->co[vd.i]);
03325                     if (vd.no) copy_v3_v3_short(vd.no, unode->no[vd.i]);
03326                     else normal_short_to_float_v3(vd.fno, unode->no[vd.i]);
03327 
03328                     if (vd.mvert) vd.mvert->flag |= ME_VERT_PBVH_UPDATE;
03329                 }
03330                 BLI_pbvh_vertex_iter_end;
03331 
03332                 BLI_pbvh_node_mark_update(nodes[n]);
03333             }
03334         }
03335 
03336         if (ss->face_normals) {
03337             float *fn = ss->face_normals;
03338             for (i = 0; i < ss->totpoly; ++i, fn += 3)
03339                 copy_v3_v3(fn, cache->face_norms[i]);
03340         }
03341 
03342         if (nodes)
03343             MEM_freeN(nodes);
03344     }
03345 }
03346 
03347 static void sculpt_flush_update(bContext *C)
03348 {
03349     Object *ob = CTX_data_active_object(C);
03350     SculptSession *ss = ob->sculpt;
03351     ARegion *ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
03352     MultiresModifierData *mmd = ss->multires;
03353 
03354     if (mmd)
03355         multires_mark_as_modified(ob, MULTIRES_COORDS_MODIFIED);
03356     if (ob->derivedFinal) /* VBO no longer valid */
03357         GPU_drawobject_free(ob->derivedFinal);
03358 
03359     if (ss->modifiers_active) {
03360         DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
03361         ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
03362     }
03363     else {
03364         rcti r;
03365 
03366         BLI_pbvh_update(ss->pbvh, PBVH_UpdateBB, NULL);
03367         if (sculpt_get_redraw_rect(ar, CTX_wm_region_view3d(C), ob, &r)) {
03368             if (ss->cache)
03369                 ss->cache->previous_r = r;
03370 
03371             r.xmin += ar->winrct.xmin + 1;
03372             r.xmax += ar->winrct.xmin - 1;
03373             r.ymin += ar->winrct.ymin + 1;
03374             r.ymax += ar->winrct.ymin - 1;
03375 
03376             ss->partial_redraw = 1;
03377             ED_region_tag_redraw_partial(ar, &r);
03378         }
03379     }
03380 }
03381 
03382 /* Returns whether the mouse/stylus is over the mesh (1)
03383  * or over the background (0) */
03384 static int over_mesh(bContext *C, struct wmOperator *UNUSED(op), float x, float y)
03385 {
03386     float mouse[2], co[3];
03387 
03388     mouse[0] = x;
03389     mouse[1] = y;
03390 
03391     return sculpt_stroke_get_location(C, co, mouse);
03392 }
03393 
03394 static int sculpt_stroke_test_start(bContext *C, struct wmOperator *op,
03395                                     wmEvent *event)
03396 {
03397     /* Don't start the stroke until mouse goes over the mesh.
03398      * note: event will only be null when re-executing the saved stroke. */
03399     if (event == NULL || over_mesh(C, op, event->x, event->y)) {
03400         Object *ob = CTX_data_active_object(C);
03401         SculptSession *ss = ob->sculpt;
03402         Sculpt *sd = CTX_data_tool_settings(C)->sculpt;
03403 
03404         ED_view3d_init_mats_rv3d(ob, CTX_wm_region_view3d(C));
03405 
03406         sculpt_update_cache_invariants(C, sd, ss, op, event);
03407 
03408         sculpt_undo_push_begin(sculpt_tool_name(sd));
03409 
03410 #ifdef _OPENMP
03411         /* If using OpenMP then create a number of threads two times the
03412          * number of processor cores.
03413          * Justification: Empirically I've found that two threads per
03414          * processor gives higher throughput. */
03415         if (sd->flags & SCULPT_USE_OPENMP) {
03416             int num_procs;
03417 
03418             num_procs = omp_get_num_procs();
03419             omp_set_num_threads(2 * num_procs);
03420         }
03421 #endif
03422 
03423         return 1;
03424     }
03425     else
03426         return 0;
03427 }
03428 
03429 static void sculpt_stroke_update_step(bContext *C, struct PaintStroke *stroke, PointerRNA *itemptr)
03430 {
03431     Sculpt *sd = CTX_data_tool_settings(C)->sculpt;
03432     Object *ob = CTX_data_active_object(C);
03433     SculptSession *ss = ob->sculpt;
03434     
03435     sculpt_stroke_modifiers_check(C, ob);
03436     sculpt_update_cache_variants(C, sd, ob, stroke, itemptr);
03437     sculpt_restore_mesh(sd, ss);
03438     do_symmetrical_brush_actions(sd, ob);
03439 
03440     /* Cleanup */
03441     sculpt_flush_update(C);
03442 }
03443 
03444 static void sculpt_brush_exit_tex(Sculpt *sd)
03445 {
03446     Brush *brush = paint_brush(&sd->paint);
03447     MTex *mtex = &brush->mtex;
03448 
03449     if (mtex->tex && mtex->tex->nodetree)
03450         ntreeTexEndExecTree(mtex->tex->nodetree->execdata, 1);
03451 }
03452 
03453 static void sculpt_stroke_done(bContext *C, struct PaintStroke *UNUSED(stroke))
03454 {
03455     Object *ob = CTX_data_active_object(C);
03456     SculptSession *ss = ob->sculpt;
03457     Sculpt *sd = CTX_data_tool_settings(C)->sculpt;
03458 
03459     /* reset values used to draw brush after completing the stroke */
03460     sd->draw_anchored = 0;
03461     sd->draw_pressure = 0;
03462     sd->special_rotation = 0;
03463 
03464     /* Finished */
03465     if (ss->cache) {
03466         Brush *brush = paint_brush(&sd->paint);
03467         brush->flag &= ~BRUSH_INVERTED;
03468 
03469         sculpt_stroke_modifiers_check(C, ob);
03470 
03471         /* Alt-Smooth */
03472         if (ss->cache->alt_smooth) {
03473             Paint *p = &sd->paint;
03474             brush = (Brush *)find_id("BR", ss->cache->saved_active_brush_name);
03475             if (brush) {
03476                 paint_brush_set(p, brush);
03477             }
03478         }
03479 
03480         sculpt_cache_free(ss->cache);
03481         ss->cache = NULL;
03482 
03483         sculpt_undo_push_end();
03484 
03485         BLI_pbvh_update(ss->pbvh, PBVH_UpdateOriginalBB, NULL);
03486 
03487         /* optimization: if there is locked key and active modifiers present in */
03488         /* the stack, keyblock is updating at each step. otherwise we could update */
03489         /* keyblock only when stroke is finished */
03490         if (ss->kb && !ss->modifiers_active) sculpt_update_keyblock(ob);
03491 
03492         ss->partial_redraw = 0;
03493 
03494         /* try to avoid calling this, only for e.g. linked duplicates now */
03495         if (((Mesh *)ob->data)->id.us > 1)
03496             DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
03497 
03498         WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT | ND_DRAW, ob);
03499     }
03500 
03501     sculpt_brush_exit_tex(sd);
03502 }
03503 
03504 static int sculpt_brush_stroke_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
03505 {
03506     struct PaintStroke *stroke;
03507     int ignore_background_click;
03508 
03509     if (!sculpt_brush_stroke_init(C, op))
03510         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
03511 
03512     stroke = paint_stroke_new(C, sculpt_stroke_get_location,
03513                               sculpt_stroke_test_start,
03514                               sculpt_stroke_update_step,
03515                               sculpt_stroke_done, event->type);
03516 
03517     op->customdata = stroke;
03518 
03519     /* For tablet rotation */
03520     ignore_background_click = RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr,
03521                                               "ignore_background_click");
03522 
03523     if (ignore_background_click && !over_mesh(C, op, event->x, event->y)) {
03524         paint_stroke_free(stroke);
03525         return OPERATOR_PASS_THROUGH;
03526     }
03527     
03528     /* add modal handler */
03529     WM_event_add_modal_handler(C, op);
03530 
03531     op->type->modal(C, op, event);
03532     
03533     return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
03534 }
03535 
03536 static int sculpt_brush_stroke_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
03537 {
03538     if (!sculpt_brush_stroke_init(C, op))
03539         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
03540 
03541     op->customdata = paint_stroke_new(C, sculpt_stroke_get_location, sculpt_stroke_test_start,
03542                                       sculpt_stroke_update_step, sculpt_stroke_done, 0);
03543 
03544     /* frees op->customdata */
03545     paint_stroke_exec(C, op);
03546 
03547     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
03548 }
03549 
03550 static int sculpt_brush_stroke_cancel(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
03551 {
03552     Object *ob = CTX_data_active_object(C);
03553     SculptSession *ss = ob->sculpt;
03554     Sculpt *sd = CTX_data_tool_settings(C)->sculpt;
03555 
03556     paint_stroke_cancel(C, op);
03557 
03558     if (ss->cache) {
03559         sculpt_cache_free(ss->cache);
03560         ss->cache = NULL;
03561     }
03562 
03563     sculpt_brush_exit_tex(sd);
03564 
03565     return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
03566 }
03567 
03568 static void SCULPT_OT_brush_stroke(wmOperatorType *ot)
03569 {
03570     static EnumPropertyItem stroke_mode_items[] = {
03571         {BRUSH_STROKE_NORMAL, "NORMAL", 0, "Normal", "Apply brush normally"},
03572         {BRUSH_STROKE_INVERT, "INVERT", 0, "Invert", "Invert action of brush for duration of stroke"},
03573         {BRUSH_STROKE_SMOOTH, "SMOOTH", 0, "Smooth", "Switch brush to smooth mode for duration of stroke"},
03574         {0}
03575     };
03576 
03577     /* identifiers */
03578     ot->name = "Sculpt Mode";
03579     ot->idname = "SCULPT_OT_brush_stroke";
03580     
03581     /* api callbacks */
03582     ot->invoke = sculpt_brush_stroke_invoke;
03583     ot->modal = paint_stroke_modal;
03584     ot->exec = sculpt_brush_stroke_exec;
03585     ot->poll = sculpt_poll;
03586     ot->cancel = sculpt_brush_stroke_cancel;
03587 
03588     /* flags (sculpt does own undo? (ton) */
03589     ot->flag = OPTYPE_BLOCKING;
03590 
03591     /* properties */
03592 
03593     RNA_def_collection_runtime(ot->srna, "stroke", &RNA_OperatorStrokeElement,
03594                                "Stroke", "");
03595 
03596     RNA_def_enum(ot->srna, "mode", stroke_mode_items, BRUSH_STROKE_NORMAL, 
03597                  "Sculpt Stroke Mode",
03598                  "Action taken when a sculpt stroke is made");
03599 
03600     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "ignore_background_click", 0,
03601                     "Ignore Background Click",
03602                     "Clicks on the background do not start the stroke");
03603 }
03604 
03605 /**** Reset the copy of the mesh that is being sculpted on (currently just for the layer brush) ****/
03606 
03607 static int sculpt_set_persistent_base(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
03608 {
03609     SculptSession *ss = CTX_data_active_object(C)->sculpt;
03610 
03611     if (ss) {
03612         if (ss->layer_co)
03613             MEM_freeN(ss->layer_co);
03614         ss->layer_co = NULL;
03615     }
03616 
03617     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
03618 }
03619 
03620 static void SCULPT_OT_set_persistent_base(wmOperatorType *ot)
03621 {
03622     /* identifiers */
03623     ot->name = "Set Persistent Base";
03624     ot->idname = "SCULPT_OT_set_persistent_base";
03625     
03626     /* api callbacks */
03627     ot->exec = sculpt_set_persistent_base;
03628     ot->poll = sculpt_mode_poll;
03629     
03630     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER | OPTYPE_UNDO;
03631 }
03632 
03633 /**** Toggle operator for turning sculpt mode on or off ****/
03634 
03635 static void sculpt_init_session(Scene *scene, Object *ob)
03636 {
03637     ob->sculpt = MEM_callocN(sizeof(SculptSession), "sculpt session");
03638 
03639     sculpt_update_mesh_elements(scene, scene->toolsettings->sculpt, ob, 0);
03640 }
03641 
03642 static int sculpt_toggle_mode(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
03643 {
03644     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
03645     ToolSettings *ts = CTX_data_tool_settings(C);
03646     Object *ob = CTX_data_active_object(C);
03647     MultiresModifierData *mmd = sculpt_multires_active(scene, ob);
03648     int flush_recalc = 0;
03649 
03650     /* multires in sculpt mode could have different from object mode subdivision level */
03651     flush_recalc |= mmd && mmd->sculptlvl != mmd->lvl;
03652     /* if object has got active modifiers, it's dm could be different in sculpt mode  */
03653     flush_recalc |= sculpt_has_active_modifiers(scene, ob);
03654 
03655     if (ob->mode & OB_MODE_SCULPT) {
03656         if (mmd)
03657             multires_force_update(ob);
03658 
03659         if (flush_recalc)
03660             DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
03661 
03662         /* Leave sculptmode */
03663         ob->mode &= ~OB_MODE_SCULPT;
03664 
03665         free_sculptsession(ob);
03666     }
03667     else {
03668         /* Enter sculptmode */
03669         ob->mode |= OB_MODE_SCULPT;
03670 
03671         if (flush_recalc)
03672             DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
03673         
03674         /* Create persistent sculpt mode data */
03675         if (!ts->sculpt) {
03676             ts->sculpt = MEM_callocN(sizeof(Sculpt), "sculpt mode data");
03677 
03678             /* Turn on X plane mirror symmetry by default */
03679             ts->sculpt->flags |= SCULPT_SYMM_X;
03680         }
03681 
03682         /* Create sculpt mode session data */
03683         if (ob->sculpt)
03684             free_sculptsession(ob);
03685 
03686         sculpt_init_session(scene, ob);
03687 
03688         paint_init(&ts->sculpt->paint, PAINT_CURSOR_SCULPT);
03689         
03690         paint_cursor_start(C, sculpt_poll);
03691     }
03692 
03693     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE | ND_MODE, CTX_data_scene(C));
03694 
03695     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
03696 }
03697 
03698 static void SCULPT_OT_sculptmode_toggle(wmOperatorType *ot)
03699 {
03700     /* identifiers */
03701     ot->name = "Sculpt Mode";
03702     ot->idname = "SCULPT_OT_sculptmode_toggle";
03703     
03704     /* api callbacks */
03705     ot->exec = sculpt_toggle_mode;
03706     ot->poll = ED_operator_object_active_editable_mesh;
03707     
03708     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER | OPTYPE_UNDO;
03709 }
03710 
03711 void ED_operatortypes_sculpt(void)
03712 {
03713     WM_operatortype_append(SCULPT_OT_brush_stroke);
03714     WM_operatortype_append(SCULPT_OT_sculptmode_toggle);
03715     WM_operatortype_append(SCULPT_OT_set_persistent_base);
03716 }
